a:9:{s:11:"woocommerce";a:28:{s:4:"name";s:11:"WooCommerce";s:4:"slug";s:11:"woocommerce";s:7:"version";s:5:"6.0.0";s:6:"author";s:48:"<a href="https://woocommerce.com">Automattic</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:41:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/woothemes/";s:8:"requires";s:3:"5.6";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.8.2";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"7.0";s:6:"rating";i:90;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:3172;i:4;i:157;i:3;i:83;i:2;i:83;i:1;i:323;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:3818;s:15:"support_threads";i:1979;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:1804;s:10:"downloaded";i:163968974;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2021-12-15 7:53pm GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2011-09-27";s:8:"homepage";s:24:"https://woocommerce.com/";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:11525:"<p>WooCommerce is <a href="https://trends.builtwith.com/shop" rel="nofollow ugc">the world’s most popular</a> open-source eCommerce solution.</p>
<p>Our core platform is free, flexible, and amplified by a global community. The freedom of open-source means you retain full ownership of your store’s content and data forever.</p>
<p>Whether you’re launching a business, taking brick-and-mortar retail online, or developing sites for clients, use WooCommerce for a store that powerfully blends content and commerce.</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Create beautiful, enticing storefronts</strong> with <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/themes/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">themes</a> suited to your brand and industry.</li>
<li><strong>Customize pages in minutes</strong> using modular <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/woocommerce-blocks/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">product blocks</a>.</li>
<li>Showcase physical and digital goods, product variations, custom configurations, instant downloads, and affiliate items. <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-bookings/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Bookings</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-memberships/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">memberships</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-subscriptions/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">subscriptions</a>, and <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/dynamic-pricing/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">dynamic pricing</a> rules are only an extension away.</li>
<li><strong>Rise to the top of search results</strong> by leveraging <a href="https://www.searchenginejournal.com/wordpress-best-cms-seo/" rel="nofollow ugc">WordPress’ SEO advantage</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p>Built-in tools and popular integrations help you efficiently manage your business operations. Many services are free to add with a single click via the optional <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/woocommerce-setup-wizard/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Setup Wizard</a>.</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Choose how you want to get paid</strong>. Conveniently manage payments from the comfort of your store with <a href="https://woocommerce.com/payments/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce Payments</a> (Available in the U.S., U.K., Ireland, Australia, New Zealand, Canada, and now: Spain, France, Germany, and Italy). Securely accept cards, mobile wallets, bank transfers, and cash thanks to <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/woocommerce-extensions/payment-gateways/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">100+ payment gateways</a> – including <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/stripe/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Stripe</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-gateway-paypal-checkout/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">PayPal</a>, and <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/square/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Square</a>.</li>
<li><strong>Configure your shipping options</strong>. Print USPS labels right from your dashboard and even schedule a pickup with <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/shipping/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce Shipping</a> (U.S.-only). Connect with <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/woocommerce-extensions/shipping-methods/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">well-known carriers</a> such as UPS, FedEx, and ShipStation – plus a wide variety of delivery, inventory, and fulfillment solutions for your locale.</li>
<li><strong>Simplify sales tax</strong>. Add <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/tax/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce Tax</a> or <a href="https://woocommerce.com/product-category/woocommerce-extensions/tax?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">similar integrated services</a> to make automated calculations a reality.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Grow your business, add features, and monitor your store on the go</h4>
<p>WooCommerce means business. Keep tabs on the performance metrics most important to you with <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/woocommerce-admin/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing">WooCommerce Admin</a> – a powerful, customizable central dashboard for your store.</p>
<p>Expand your audience across marketing and social channels with <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/google-ads/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Google Ads</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/hubspot-for-woocommerce/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">HubSpot</a>, <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/mailchimp-for-woocommerce/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Mailchimp</a>, and <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/facebook/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Facebook</a> integrations. You can always check out the in-dashboard <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/marketing-hub/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Marketing Hub</a> for fresh ideas and tips to help you succeed.</p>
<p>Enhance store functionality with hundreds of free and paid extensions from the <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">official WooCommerce Marketplace</a>. Our developers <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/marketplace-overview/#section-6?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">vet each new extension</a> and regularly review existing inventory to maintain Marketplace quality standards. We are actively <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/marketplace-overview/#section-2?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">looking for products that help store builders create successful stores</a>.</p>
<p>Manage your store from anywhere with the free WooCommerce <a href="https://woocommerce.com/mobile/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">mobile app</a> (Android and iOS). Spoiler alert: Keep an ear out for the slightly addictive &#8220;cha-ching&#8221; notification sound each time you make a new sale!</p>
<h4>Own and control your store data – forever</h4>
<p>With WooCommerce, your data belongs to you. Always.</p>
<p>If you opt to share <a href="https://woocommerce.com/usage-tracking/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">usage data</a> with us, you can feel confident knowing that it’s anonymized and kept secure. Choose to opt-out at any time without impacting your store.</p>
<p>Unlike hosted eCommerce solutions, WooCommerce store data is future-proof; should you wish to migrate to a different platform, you’re free to export all your content and take your site wherever you choose. No restrictions.</p>
<h4>Why developers choose (and love) WooCommerce</h4>
<p>Developers can use WooCommerce to create, customize, and scale a store to meet a client’s exact specifications, making enhancements through extensions or custom solutions.</p>
<ul>
<li>Leverage <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/introduction-to-hooks-actions-and-filters/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">hooks and filters</a> to modify or create functionality.</li>
<li>Integrate virtually any service using a robust <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/woocommerce-rest-api/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">REST API</a> and webhooks.</li>
<li>Design and build custom content blocks with React.</li>
<li><a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/documentation/plugins/woocommerce/woocommerce-codex/extending/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Inspect and modify</a> any aspect of the core plugin code.</li>
<li>Speed up development with a lightning-fast <a href="https://woocommerce.github.io/code-reference/classes/wc-cli-rest-command.html?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">CLI</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p>The core platform is tested rigorously and often, supported by a dedicated development team working across time zones. Comprehensive documentation is updated with each release, empowering you to build exactly the store required.</p>
<h4>Be part of our growing international community</h4>
<p>WooCommerce has a large, passionate community dedicated to helping merchants succeed, and it’s growing fast.</p>
<p>There are <a href="https://woocommerce.com/meetups/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce Meetups</a> in locations around the world that you can attend for free and even get involved in running. These events are a great way to learn from others, share your expertise, and connect with like-minded folks.</p>
<p>WooCommerce also has a regular presence at WordCamps across the globe – we’d love to meet you.</p>
<h4>Contribute and translate</h4>
<p>WooCommerce is developed and supported by Automattic, the creators of WordPress.com and Jetpack. We also have hundreds of independent contributors, and there’s always room for more. Head to the <a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce GitHub Repository</a> to find out how you can pitch in.</p>
<p>WooCommerce is translated into multiple languages, including Danish, Ukrainian, and Persian. Help localize WooCommerce even further by adding your locale – visit <a href="https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/woocommerce/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">translate.wordpress.org</a>.</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:2305:"<h4>Minimum Requirements</h4>
<ul>
<li>PHP 7.2 or greater is recommended</li>
<li>MySQL 5.6 or greater is recommended</li>
</ul>
<p>Visit the <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/server-requirements/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce server requirements documentation</a> for a detailed list of server requirements.</p>
<h4>Automatic installation</h4>
<p>Automatic installation is the easiest option &#8212; WordPress will handle the file transfer, and you won’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of WooCommerce, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu, and click “Add New.”</p>
<p>In the search field type “WooCommerce,” then click “Search Plugins.” Once you’ve found us,  you can view details about it such as the point release, rating, and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by! Click “Install Now,” and WordPress will take it from there.</p>
<h4>Manual installation</h4>
<p>Manual installation method requires downloading the WooCommerce plugin and uploading it to your web server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/article/managing-plugins/#manual-plugin-installation">instructions on how to do this here</a>.</p>
<h4>Updating</h4>
<p>Automatic updates should work smoothly, but we still recommend you back up your site.</p>
<p>If you encounter issues with the shop/category pages after an update, flush the permalinks by going to WordPress &gt; Settings &gt; Permalinks and hitting “Save.” That should return things to normal.</p>
<h4>Sample data</h4>
<p>WooCommerce comes with some sample data you can use to see how products look; import sample_products.xml via the <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wordpress-importer/">WordPress importer</a>. You can also use the core <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/product-csv-importer-exporter/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">CSV importer</a> or our <a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/product-csv-import-suite/?utm_source=wp%20org%20repo%20listing&amp;utm_content=3.6" rel="nofollow ugc">CSV Import Suite extension</a> to import sample_products.csv</p>
";s:3:"faq";s:7903:"
<dt id='where%20can%20i%20find%20woocommerce%20documentation%20and%20user%20guides%3F'>
Where can I find WooCommerce documentation and user guides?
</h4>
<p>
<p>For help setting up and configuring WooCommerce, please refer to <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/documentation/plugins/woocommerce/getting-started/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Getting Started</a> and the <a href="https://woocommerce.com/guides/new-store/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">New WooCommerce Store Owner Guide</a>.</p>
<p>For extending or theming WooCommerce, see our <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/documentation/plugins/woocommerce/woocommerce-codex/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">codex</a>, as well as the <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/create-a-plugin/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Plugin Developer Handbook</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='where%20can%20i%20get%20help%20or%20talk%20to%20other%20users%20about%20woocommerce%20core%3F'>
Where can I get help or talk to other users about WooCommerce Core?
</h4>
<p>
<p>If you get stuck, you can ask for help in the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/woocommerce/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing">WooCommerce Support Forum</a> by following <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/guide-to-the-woocommerce-forum/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing">these guidelines</a>, reach out via the <a href="https://woocommerce.com/community-slack/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce Community Slack</a>, or post in the <a href="https://www.facebook.com/groups/advanced.woocommerce?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce Community group</a> on Facebook.</p>
</p>
<dt id='where%20can%20i%20get%20help%20for%20extensions%20i%20have%20purchased%20on%20woocommerce.com%3F'>
Where can I get help for extensions I have purchased on WooCommerce.com?
</h4>
<p>
<p>For assistance with paid extensions from the WooCommerce.com Marketplace: first, review our <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/woocommerce-self-service-guide/" rel="nofollow ugc">self-service troubleshooting guide</a>. If the problem persists, kindly log a support ticket via <a href="https://woocommerce.com/my-account/create-a-ticket/" rel="nofollow ugc">our helpdesk</a>. Our dedicated Happiness Engineers aim to respond within 24 hours.</p>
</p>
<dt id='i%E2%80%99m%20having%20trouble%20logging%20in%20to%20woocommerce.com%20%E2%80%93%20what%20now%3F'>
I’m having trouble logging in to WooCommerce.com – what now?
</h4>
<p>
<p>First, troubleshoot common login issues using this helpful <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/log-into-woocommerce-com-with-wordpress-com/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">step-by-step guide</a>. Still not working? <a href="https://woocommerce.com/contact-us/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Get in touch with us</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='will%20woocommerce%20work%20with%20my%20theme%3F'>
Will WooCommerce work with my theme?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes! WooCommerce will work with any theme but may require some additional styling. If you’re looking for a theme featuring deep WooCommerce integration, we recommend <a href="https://woocommerce.com/storefront/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Storefront</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='how%20do%20i%20update%20woocommerce%3F'>
How do I update WooCommerce?
</h4>
<p>
<p>We have a detailed guide on <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/how-to-update-woocommerce/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">How To Update WooCommerce</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='my%20site%20broke%20%E2%80%93%20what%20do%20i%20do%3F'>
My site broke – what do I do?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Start by diagnosing the issue using our helpful <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/documentation/get-help/troubleshooting-get-help/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">troubleshooting guide</a>.</p>
<p>If you noticed the error after updating a theme or plugin, there might be compatibility issues between it and WooCommerce. If the issue appeared after updating WooCommerce, there could be a conflict between WooCommerce and an outdated theme or plugin.</p>
<p>In both instances, we recommend running a conflict test using <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/troubleshooting-using-health-check/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Health Check</a> (which allows you to disable themes and plugins without affecting your visitors) or troubleshooting the issue using a <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/how-to-test-for-conflicts/#section-3?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">staging site</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='where%20can%20i%20report%20bugs%3F'>
Where can I report bugs?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Report bugs on the <a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/issues?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce GitHub repository</a>. You can also notify us via our support forum – be sure to search the forums to confirm that the error has not already been reported.</p>
</p>
<dt id='where%20can%20i%20request%20new%20features%2C%20themes%2C%20and%20extensions%3F'>
Where can I request new features, themes, and extensions?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Request new features and extensions and vote on existing suggestions on our official <a href="https://ideas.woocommerce.com/forums/133476-woocommerce?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">ideas board</a>. Our Product teams regularly review requests and consider them valuable for product planning.</p>
</p>
<dt id='woocommerce%20is%20awesome%21%20can%20i%20contribute%3F'>
WooCommerce is awesome! Can I contribute?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, you can! Join in on our <a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">GitHub repository</a> and follow the <a href="https://woocommerce.wordpress.com/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">development blog</a> to stay up-to-date with everything happening in the project.</p>
</p>
<dt id='where%20can%20i%20find%20rest%20api%20documentation%3F'>
Where can I find REST API documentation?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Extensive <a href="https://woocommerce.github.io/woocommerce-rest-api-docs/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce REST API Documentation</a> is available on GitHub.</p>
</p>
<dt id='my%20question%20is%20not%20listed%20here.%20where%20can%20i%20find%20more%20answers%3F'>
My question is not listed here. Where can I find more answers?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Check out <a href="https://docs.woocommerce.com/document/frequently-asked-questions/?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=wordpress.org&amp;utm_campaign=wp_org_repo_listing" rel="nofollow ugc">Frequently Asked Questions</a> for more.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:18748:"<h4>6.0.0 2021-12-14</h4>
<p><strong>WooCommerce</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Localization &#8211; Improve internationalization and add regions for Chile. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/30875" rel="nofollow ugc">#30875</a>)</li>
<li>Localization &#8211; Add &#8216;GB&#8217; back to countries that are recommended to use automated taxes. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/31100" rel="nofollow ugc">#31100</a>)</li>
<li>Enhancement &#8211; Improve the performance of the filtering by attributes using the new lookup table. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/31212" rel="nofollow ugc">#31212</a>)</li>
<li>Enhancement &#8211; Stop using options table to store rate limits. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/30960" rel="nofollow ugc">#30960</a>)</li>
<li>Enhancement &#8211; Support for dynamic price period in in-app marketplace product cards. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/31026" rel="nofollow ugc">#31026</a>)</li>
<li>Enhancement &#8211; warning to developers to avoid gotcha with shipping rates. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/30958" rel="nofollow ugc">#30958</a>)</li>
<li>Enhancement &#8211; Add woocommerce_product_options_shipping_product_data hook to product data metabox. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/30876" rel="nofollow ugc">#30876</a>)</li>
<li>Enhancement &#8211; Ensure empty arrays can be cached. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/31077" rel="nofollow ugc">#31077</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Remove the need to invoke LookupDataStore-&gt;show_feature() to use the product attributes lookup table. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/31228" rel="nofollow ugc">#31228</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Add new action hook woocommerce_after_variations_table after the product variations table (within the add-to-cart form). (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/29642" rel="nofollow ugc">#29642</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Email password reset link instead of password for new customers. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/31257" rel="nofollow ugc">#31257</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Disable autocomplete on quantity input field to prevent stale values in Firefox. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/31196" rel="nofollow ugc">#31196</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Correct the Iraqi Dinar (IQD) symbol. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/31070" rel="nofollow ugc">#31070</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Add Product Reviews filter for review comment type to the WordPress comment page. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/31004" rel="nofollow ugc">#31004</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; has_block_template method: Add apply_filters to the function which will enable third-party plugins to override the return value. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/30997" rel="nofollow ugc">#30997</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Clarify tooltip for when the on-hold email is sent. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/30970" rel="nofollow ugc">#30970</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Perform check for has product archive if current theme is an FSE theme, and not just if it has current_theme_supports( &#8216;woocommerce&#8217; ); (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/31094" rel="nofollow ugc">#31094</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Remove the absolute path to the currency-info.php from within locale-info.php. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/30935" rel="nofollow ugc">#30935</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Update track properties to follow correct format. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/30899" rel="nofollow ugc">#30899</a>)</li>
<li>Tweak &#8211; Merge Marketplace and My Subscriptions pages back into one Extensions page. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/31085" rel="nofollow ugc">#31085</a>)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fixes an issue that prevented database update notices from being dismissed. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/31075" rel="nofollow ugc">#31075</a>)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Duplicate coupon usage count when order is created via admin/API and status is changed. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/31147" rel="nofollow ugc">#31147</a>)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Corrects the display of negative refund values within the order editor screen. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/30957" rel="nofollow ugc">#30957</a>)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fix bug when creating REST API keys with very long descriptions. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/30901" rel="nofollow ugc">#30901</a>)</li>
<li>Fix &#8211; Fix products API orderby slug and include. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/30873" rel="nofollow ugc">#30873</a>)</li>
<li>Dev &#8211; Remove defunct AJAX events. (<a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce/pull/30931" rel="nofollow ugc">#30931</a>)</li>
</ul>

<p><strong>WooCommerce Blocks &#8211; 6.2.0 &amp; 6.3.0 &amp; 6.3.1 &amp; 6.3.2</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Enhancement &#8211; Legacy Template Block: allow users to delete the block. ( <a href="https://github.com/woocommerce/woocommerce-gutenberg-products-block/pull/5176" rel="nofollow ugc">#5176</a> )</li>

<li>Enhancement &#8211; Deprecate the __experimental_woocommerce_blocks_checkout_update_order_from_request action in favour of woocommerce_blocks_checkout_update_order_from_request. g/plugin/woocommerce.zip";}s:11:"donate_link";s:0:"";s:5:"icons";a:2:{s:2:"1x";s:64:"https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/icon-128x128.png?rev=2366418";s:2:"2x";s:64:"https://ps.w.org/woocommerce/assets/icon-256x256.png?rev=2366418";}s:12:"contributors";a:0:{}s:6:"market";N;s:11:"custom_link";N;}s:14:"codistoconnect";a:28:{s:4:"name";s:109:"Multichannel for WooCommerce: Google, Amazon, eBay &amp; Walmart Integration &#8211; Channel Cloud by Codisto";s:4:"slug";s:14:"codistoconnect";s:7:"version";s:6:"1.3.63";s:6:"author";s:42:"<a href="https://codisto.com/">Codisto</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:39:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/codisto/";s:8:"requires";s:3:"4.0";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.8.2";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.6";s:6:"rating";i:66;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:17;i:4;i:0;i:3;i:0;i:2;i:3;i:1;i:11;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:31;s:15:"support_threads";i:1;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:0;s:10:"downloaded";i:53277;s:12:"last_updated";s:22:"2021-08-26 <li>Download of the extension is free.</li>
<li>14 day free trial of integration services.</li>
<li>Paid subscription required for integration services after 14 days of free trial.</li>
<li>For more details on pricing, please see https://codisto.com/pricing.html.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Smarter Google</h3>
<p>Boost sales with automated Product Listing Ads and quickly list and manage products on Google Shopping and Surfaces Across Google. Full ‘Buy on Google’ &amp; enhanced listings support.</p>
<h3>Smarter Amazon</h3>
<p>Visit https://codisto.com/connect/ to read more about Codisto LINQ including documentation, installation instructions and pricing.</p>
<h3>Smarter eBay</h3>
<p>Unrivalled listing automation &amp; sync control on any global eBay marketplace direct from WooCommerce, retaining existing listings &amp; sales history.</p>
<h3>Smarter Walmart</h3>
<p>Reach over 120 million monthly visitors on Walmart.com directly from WooCommerce and quickly list and manage thousands of products on Walmart Marketplace.</p>
<p>** <em>Multichannel for WooCommerce is free to download and install but requires a paid monthly subscription for ongoing integration services after the 14-day free trial period. For more details on pricing, see below.</em></p>
<p>Multichannel for WooCommerce by Codisto is a Google channel, an Amazon channel, an eBay channel and a Walmart Channel all in one smartly designed extension for WooCommerce.</p>
<p>Multichannel for WooCommerce functions as a marketplace listing tool and a fully-featured multichannel solution with real-time inventory &amp; pricing sync directly from WooCommerce.</p>
<p>Other multichannel selling tools for WooCommerce require you to export &amp; migrate your entire product catalog to their platform, but with Multichannel for WooCommerce powering your Google, Amazon, eBay and Walmart integration you can connect to all their global marketplaces and sales channels directly from WooCommerce giving you complete control of your Amazon, eBay, Walmart and Google listings and Google Product Listing Ads</p>
<h3>Features:</h3>
<ul>
<li>All global Google, Amazon, Walmart &amp; eBay sales channels with in-built currency control</li>
<li>All WooCommerce store currencies</li>
<li>Create new or link existing Google, Amazon, Walmart &amp; eBay listings in bulk</li>
<li>Real-time sync of inventory, orders, pricing &amp; product details</li>
<li>Supports use of channel specific titles, prices, descriptions &amp; product details</li>
<li>Create Buy on Google listings &amp; Product Listing Ads for Google Search, Google Shopping, YouTube, Google Display Network and more Surfaces Across Google</li>
</ul>
<h3>Smarter Listing Creation &amp; Linking</h3>
<p>Choose from three distinct listing modes – single-listing, multi-listing or attribute mapping mode – with a suite of powerful automation features making it easier than ever before to create, sync and manage sales channel listings across Google, Amazon, eBay and Walmart all in the one place.</p>
<ul>
<li>Create new listings for Google, Amazon, eBay and Walmart in bulk, including new Amazon ASINs</li>
<li>Built-in smarts for auto-categorization and enhanced listing creation</li>
<li>Boost conversion with Buy on Google checkout and integrated order flow support</li>
<li>Automatically create Google Product Listing Ads and set daily budgets directly from Multichannel for WooCommerce</li>
<li>Already selling on sales channels? Multichannel for WooCommerce automatically links any Google, Amazon, eBay and Walmart listings in minutes protecting search ranking and sales history</li>
</ul>
<h3>Receive Multichannel Orders in WooCommerce with Fully Synced &amp; Integrated Order Flow</h3>
<p>Sales channel orders are received in WooCommerce, and by updating inventory counts across all your connected sales channels and marketplaces as soon as a sale is made, Multichannel for WooCommerce prevents overselling and allows you to manage inventory efficiently for all sales channels</p>
<ul>
<li>Receive multichannel orders in WooCommerce</li>
<li>Shipment tracking data and fulfilment status automatically updated on sales channels</li>
<li>No overselling or paying for ads on out-of-stock products</li>
</ul>
<h3>100% Real-time Sync for Everything with Codisto SmartSync™</h3>
<p>Avoid having to update listings on every channel; Change once in WooCommerce and Multichannel for WooCommerce automatically updates all sales channel listings.</p>
<ul>
<li>Real-time sync with Amazon Seller Central, eBay Seller Hub, Walmart Seller Center and Google Merchant Center – no periodic data feeds!</li>
</ul>
<h3>Flexible Pricing Plans to Suit Your Business</h3>
<p>Multichannel for WooCommerce is free to download, install and try for 14-days, after which a recurring paid subscription is required for ongoing integration services provided by Codisto.</p>
<p>All plans come with the full range of features including real-time sync for inventory, pricing, orders and product information, as well as 24/7 customer support.</p>
<p>The <em>Codisto Elite</em> plan with unlimited orders and <em>Channel Cloud Plus</em> plans are also available for high-volume merchants.</p>
<p>For more information on pricing visit https://codisto.com/pricing.html.</p>
<p><strong>Multichannel for WooCommerce is the only official WooCommerce extension that connects your online store with millions of customers on Google, Amazon, eBay and Walmart.</strong></p>
<p><strong>Take control of your multichannel strategy and reach more customers with Multichannel for WooCommerce!Install Multichannel for WooCommerce today and get 14 days free to create, sync and manage listings on any number of global Google, Amazon, eBay and Walmart sales channels.</strong></p>
";s:12:"installation";s:373:"<ol>
<li>Install Codisto LINQ by Codisto either via the WordPress.org plugin repository, or by uploading the files to your server</li>
<li>Choose either “Connect your Amazon/eBay account” or “Enter your email address” and follow the setup instructions.</li>
<li>Choose which items you wish to list from the Codisto &gt; Listings screen and click publish</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:14698:"
<dt id='how%20long%20does%20it%20take%20to%20set%20up%20and%20start%20selling%3F'>
How long does it take to set up and start selling?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Because Multichannel for WooCommerce sits inside your existing WooCommerce platform there’s no data migration to a separate multi-channel platform required which can save days or even weeks of setup time.</p>
<p>With Multichannel for WooCommerce, installation and connecting a sales channel takes about a minute. Setting default listing values takes another minute or so. If you are happy listing all products with default values there is nothing more to do except enable the products (in bulk) you want to list (or link to existing listings).</p>
<p>Amazon, Walmart and eBay limit the speed of listing hundreds or thousands of products to a certain rate per minute but a few thousand products are listed in about an hour. Google Merchant Centre can take up to 3 days to verify your products. If you wish to configure certain products away from the default values, setup time is dependent on how many changes you are making but all changes can be done in bulk. It’s rare that merchants take any more than an hour or so for the most complicated configurations and everyone is normally selling same day.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20multichannel%20for%20woocommerce%20support%20all%20amazon%2C%20google%20and%20ebay%20sales%20channels%20globally%20and%20all%20woocommerce%20store%20currencies%3F'>
Does Multichannel for WooCommerce support all Amazon, Google and eBay sales channels globally and all WooCommerce store currencies?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. Multichannel for WooCommerce supports listings on all Google, Amazon and eBay sites around the world all from within WooCommerce, and listing for approved sellers on Walmart US.</p>
<p>Multichannel for WooCommerce supports all store currencies and you can use our in-built currency manager to list on sales channels in different currencies.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20set%20separate%20price%20and%20quantity%20rules%2C%20titles%20and%20descriptions%3F'>
Can I set separate price and quantity rules, titles and descriptions?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. It’s easy to set different rules for sales channel listings different to those used on your webstore and quickly apply them in bulk using in built operators or mapping fields from WooCommerce.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20do%20you%20mean%20by%20real-time%20sync%3F'>
What do you mean by real-time sync?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Multichannel for WooCommerce sync is ‘event driven’. This means as soon as something happens like an item gets sold or a price gets changed, it is constantly ‘listening’ and reacts as soon as the message that something has changed is received, which means you can’t oversell or sell at the wrong price because we avoid the need for scheduled sync events. This is different from alternative approaches which run event changes on scheduled frequencies e.g. every hour. A scheduled sync approach means you are always out of sync between schedules.</p>
</p>
<dt id='i%20already%20have%20listed%20my%20products%20on%20amazon%2Febay.%20can%20codisto%20linq%20import%20them%20to%20woocommerce%3F'>
I already have listed my products on Amazon/eBay. Can Codisto LINQ import them to WooCommerce?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No, Codisto LINQ is designed to let WooCommerce be the “source of true” – you contine to manage your products in WordPress – and use Codisto LINQ to manage which products and how they are listed on Amazon/eBay.<br />
But it is possible to map existing Amazon/eBay listings to products in WooCommerce once they are in WooCommerce with the ‘map products’ function.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20multichannel%20for%20woocommerce%20work%20with%20other%20third-party%20apps%3F'>
Does Multichannel for WooCommerce work with other third-party apps?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Multichannel for WooCommerce works well with common third-party extensions e.g. shipping integrations. Multichannel for WooCommerce ‘should’ work well with other third-party apps due to our rigorous adherence to app development guidelines.</p>
<p>However, we cannot guarantee all third-party apps have been developed in accordance with the guidelines and given the large number it is impossible to test all. If you are using a third-party app that you are already using and suspect may cause a conflict we suggest testing Multichannel for WooCommerce with a small number or products/orders first and reach out to support if you experience any difficulties.</p>
</p>
<dt id='i%20have%20amazon%2Febay%20listings%20and%20want%20to%20create%20an%20online%20store%2C%20can%20multichannel%20for%20woocommerce%20do%20that%20for%20me%3F'>
I have Amazon/eBay listings and want to create an online store, can Multichannel for WooCommerce do that for me?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No. Multichannel for WooCommerce uses your online store product catalog as the ‘source of truth’ to sync with Amazon/eBay. There are third-party importer tools available to create products in WooCommerce (search Google or app store). You can then use Multichannel for WooCommerce to create/link and sync your WooCommerce products with Google, Amazon, Walmart and eBay.</p>
</p>
<dt id='do%20you%20mark%20orders%20as%20coming%20from%20google%2C%20amazon%2C%20walmart%20or%20ebay%20when%20you%20sync%20them%20with%20woocommerce%3F'>
Do you mark orders as coming from Google, Amazon, Walmart or eBay when you sync them with WooCommerce?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. Multichannel for WooCommerce marks orders and puts them into Google, Amazon, Walmart and eBay customer groups in WooCommerce.</p>
</p>
<dt id='how%20does%20the%20free%20trial%20work%3F'>
How does the free trial work?
</h4>
<p>
<p>You can use Multichannel for WooCommerce free for 14 days. No credit card is required to install and configure (‘click around’). We ask you to choose a plan and enter credit card when you list/link your first item(s).</p>
<p>Nothing gets charged during the free trial period but we need a payment method in place should you decided to continue with Multichannel for WooCommerce at the end of the free trial period so that sync isn’t interrupted as you move from free trial to paying subscription.</p>
<p>If you want to cancel at any time during the free trial simply email support@codisto.com and nothing will ever get charged.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20happens%20at%20end%20of%20trial%3F'>
What happens at end of trial?
</h4>
<p>
<p>If you choose to continue with Multichannel for WooCommerce at the end of the free trial, we will charge your credit card for the plan selected. If you choose to cancel during the free trial period (email support@codisto.com), we’ll end sync and not charge you. Any listings created during the free trial remain active at the end of the trial (we never end them), but they are no longer kept in sync with WooCommerce.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%E2%80%99s%20included%20in%20the%20free%20trial%3F'>
What’s included in the free trial?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Everything. The product you use during your free trial is the same product you would use as a paying subscription.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20upgrade%2Fdowngrade%20anytime%3F'>
Can I upgrade/downgrade anytime?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. You can choose to upgrade or downgrade plans at any time by selecting the appropriate plan within the app.</p>
</p>
<dt id='are%20there%20any%20contracts%3F'>
Are there any contracts?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No. There’s no contract – just pay as you go, month-to-month. You can cancel at any time without penalty.</p>
</p>
<dt id='are%20there%20any%20setup%20fees%3F'>
Are there any setup fees?
</h4>
<p>
<p>There are no setup fees or hidden charges with any of our plans.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20if%20i%20go%20over%20my%20plan%20limits%3F'>
What if I go over my plan limits?
</h4>
<p>
<p>To find out more about the specific overages and inclusions in your plan, please visit the Codisto pricing page.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20kind%20of%20payments%20do%20you%20accept%3F'>
What kind of payments do you accept?
</h4>
<p>
<p>We accept Visa and Mastercard.</p>
</p>
<dt id='do%20i%20need%20my%20credit%20card%20info%20to%20sign%20up%3F'>
Do I need my credit card info to sign up?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No. You can install and experience Multichannel for WooCommerce without a credit card. We ask you to choose a plan and enter credit card when you list/link your first item(s).</p>
<p>Nothing gets charged during the free trial period but we need a payment method in place should you decided to continue with Multichannel for WooCommerce at the end of the free trial period so that sync isn’t interrupted as you move from free trial to paying subscription. If you want to cancel at any time, email support@codisto.com.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20cancel%20anytime%3F'>
Can I cancel anytime?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. If you ever decide that Multichannel for WooCommerce isn’t the best Amazon/eBay integration solution for your business, simply cancel by emailing support@codisto.com. We never end any listings when you cancel, they are just not kept in sync any longer.</p>
</p>
<dt id='do%20i%20need%20my%20own%20google%2C%20amazon%2C%20walmart%20or%20ebay%20account%20to%20use%20multichannel%20for%20woocommerce%3F'>
Do I need my own Google, Amazon, Walmart or eBay account to use Multichannel for WooCommerce?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. Multichannel for WooCommerce connects your online store to your Google/Amazon/eBay/Walmart account(s). You need an Amazon Professional Seller account (you can’t use an individual account because Amazon doesn’t allow third-party connections) or an eBay seller account (list any item on eBay manually once and eBay automatically turn an eBay buyer account into an eBay seller account). For Walmart, you will need a Walmart account and be approved to sell by applying directly to Walmart as a seller. If you do not have a Google account or Google Merchant Center account, one can be created for you automatically. You are responsible for any Google/Amazon/eBay fees – these are separate to Multichannel for WooCommerce charges.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20use%20multiple%20google%2Famazon%2Febay%2Fwalmart%20accounts%3F'>
Can I use multiple Google/Amazon/eBay/Walmart accounts?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. Multichannel for WooCommerce supports multi Google/Amazon/eBay account, multi Google/Amazon/eBay site and multi-store use</p>
</p>
<dt id='i%20operate%20two%20stores%2C%20do%20i%20need%20two%20multichannel%20for%20woocommerce%20subscriptions%3F'>
I operate two stores, do I need two Multichannel for WooCommerce subscriptions?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Multichannel for WooCommerce works on a ‘per instance’ basis so you need more than one subscription unless you have multiple stores on the same instance.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20is%20your%20support%20like%3F'>
What is your support like?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Support is available 24/7 by email, chat. Phone support is available for Channel Cloud Plus customers.</p>
</p>
<dt id='why%20is%20multichannel%20for%20woocommerce%20a%20monthly%20fee%20not%20a%20one-time%20software%20purchase%3F'>
Why is Multichannel for WooCommerce a monthly fee not a one-time software purchase?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Multichannel for WooCommerce is constantly ‘listening’ and reacting to any changes made on sales channels or your platform to ensure sync is maintained. This architecture is the only way to provide the performance demanded by professional online sellers. This requires a lot of server resources that we get charged on a monthly basis for by Amazon Web Services.</p>
<p>Also, sales channels and platforms and regularly changing their offerings in terms of features, meta data or APIs (what we use to connect stores to sales channels). Furthermore, we are having to constantly reinvest to develop new features and maintain the solution to ensure it works for all sites and platforms supported. We also provide 24/7 support. All of this is included in the monthly fee.</p>
</p>
<dt id='do%20i%20need%20to%20end%20my%20current%20ebay%20listings%20to%20use%20multichannel%20for%20woocommerce%3F'>
Do I need to end my current eBay listings to use Multichannel for WooCommerce?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No. Multichannel for WooCommerce understands the importance of retaining your current listings. During the installation flow we prompt you to ‘Link Existing eBay Listings’ which guides you through how to link your existing eBay listings to your eCommerce products. This can be done in bulk in a few clicks.</p>
</p>
<dt id='do%20you%20end%20listings%20if%20i%20cancel%20multichannel%20for%20woocommerce%3F'>
Do you end listings if I cancel Multichannel for WooCommerce?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No. Listings are never ended if you cancel your Codisto subscription for Multichannel for WooCommerce, they are just no longer kept in sync with WooCommerce and no orders are transferred to WooCommerce.</p>
</p>
<dt id='why%20does%20multichannel%20for%20woocommerce%20offer%20a%20flexi%20plan%20with%20a%20variable%20%25%20%28%2B1.9%25%20of%20sales%20channels%20sales%29%20and%20how%20does%20this%20work%3F'>
Why does Multichannel for WooCommerce offer a Flexi plan with a variable % (+1.9% of sales channels sales) and how does this work?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Some merchants are unsure how their products will sell on sales channels, but they have a lot of products they want to list and try selling. The idea of the flexi plan is to give merchants a low commitment way of trying sales channel selling.</p>
<p>Once sales are known or it becomes cheaper to move to a fixed plan, simply change plans in app. This can be done at any time. Merchants on the flexi plan get charged the fixed portion in advance and the variable portion in arrears.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20list%20selected%20products%20or%20part%20of%20my%20catalog%20or%20do%20i%20have%20to%20list%20the%20entire%20catalog%3F'>
Can I list selected products or part of my catalog or do I have to list the entire catalog?
</h4>
<p>
<p>You can choose what you want to list, individually or in bulk. Filtering and bulk edit makes it very fast to list any number of products.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20use%20multichannel%20for%20woocommerce%20just%20for%20order%20sync%20from%20amazon%2Febay%2Fwalmart%20to%20woocommerce%3F'>
Can I use Multichannel for WooCommerce just for order sync from Amazon/eBay/Walmart to WooCommerce?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Absolutely. You don’t need to list anything with Multichannel for WooCommerce to take advantage of sales channel order sync – set to “all orders” in the orders settings screen.</p>
</p>
<dt id='are%20there%20any%20more%20faq%3F'>
Are there any more FAQ?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, there are! Please check out our growing knowledgebase at <a href="http://help.codisto.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">http://help.codisto.com/</a></p>
</p>

<h4>1.2.1 &#8211; 22/04/2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>switched http headers over to be codisto specific to avoid collision with other extensions</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.2.0 &#8211; 21/04/2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>handle missing _GET variables during registrations</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.1.99 &#8211; 21/04/2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>tested against wordpress 4.5</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.1.98 &#8211; 04/04/2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>fallback to get_product defined in earlier versions of WooCommerce if wc_get_product is not defined</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.1.97 &#8211; 04/04/2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>handle older versions of wordpress by not assuming wp_json_encode</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.1.96 &#8211; 30/03/2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>shift to full size image download &#8211; wp_get_attachment_image_src takes a default 2nd arg of &#8216;thumbnail&#8217; which is now overriden to &#8216;full&#8217;</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.1.95 &#8211; 30/03/2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>had trouble updating wordpress svn so bumped version number</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.1.94 &#8211; 30/03/2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>fix rewrite rules to honour the difference between home and site url</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.1.87 &#8211; 21/03/2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>Initial public release</li>
</ul>

Form by WPForms &#8211; Drag &amp; Drop Form Builder for WordPress";s:4:"slug";s:12:"wpforms-lite";s:7:"version";s:7:"1.7.1.2";s:6:"author";s:41:"<a href="https://wpforms.com">WPForms</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:41:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/jaredatch/";s:8:"requires";s:3:"4.9";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.8.2";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.5";s:6:"rating";i:98;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:10192;i:4;i:232;i:3;i:60;i:2;i:46;i:1;i:228;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:10758;s:15:"support_threads";i:82;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:72;s:10:"downloaded";i:90315350;s:12:"last_updated";s:22:"2021-11-18 <p>We believe that you shouldn&#8217;t have to hire a developer to create a WordPress contact form. That&#8217;s why we built <a href="https://wpforms.com/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" title="WPForms" rel="friend nofollow ugc">WPForms</a>, a drag &amp; drop WordPress form builder that&#8217;s EASY and POWERFUL.</p>
<p>WPForms allows you to create beautiful contact forms, feedback form, subscription forms, payment forms, and other types of forms for your site in minutes, not hours!</p>
<p>At WPForms, user experience is our #1 priority. Our pre-built form templates and workflows make WPForms the most beginner friendly contact form plugin in the market.</p>
<p>The WPForms Challenge guides you through creating your first form in under 5 minutes. We walk you through using the form builder all the way to adding a form to a page on your site! WPForms includes integrations for popular page builders like the WordPress Block Editor (Gutenberg), Classic Editor, Elementor, and Divi making the whole process seamless.</p>
<p>WPForms is a 100% mobile responsive contact form solution, so your contact forms will always look great on all devices (mobile, tablet, laptop, and desktop).</p>
<p>WPForms&#8217; contact forms are also highly optimized for web and server performance because we understand the importance of speed when it comes to SEO, marketing, and conversion. We can honestly say that WPForms is one of the fastest WordPress contact form builder plugins in the world.</p>
<blockquote>
<p><strong>WPForms Pro</strong><br />
  This plugin is the lite version of the WPForms Pro plugin that comes with all the contact form features you will ever need including email subscription forms, multi-page contact forms, file uploads, conditional logic, payment integrations, form templates, and tons more. <a href="https://wpforms.com/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" title="WPForms" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Click here to purchase the best premium WordPress contact form plugin now!</a></p>
</blockquote>
<p>We took the pain out of creating contact forms and made it easy. Here&#8217;s why smart business owners, designers, and developers love WPForms, and you will too!</p>
<p><span class="embed-youtube" style="text-align:center; display: block;"><iframe loading="lazy" class="youtube-player" width="640" height="360" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/eiQ3viAGung?version=3&#038;rel=0&#038;showsearch=0&#038;showinfo=1&#038;iv_load_policy=1&#038;fs=1&#038;hl=en-US&#038;autohide=2&#038;wmode=transparent" allowfullscreen="true" style="border:0;" sandbox="allow-scripts allow-same-origin allow-popups allow-presentation"></iframe></span></p>
<h4>Drag &amp; Drop Contact Form Builder</h4>
<p>We were tired of the bloated and buggy contact form builder plugins. That&#8217;s why we built WPForms to adapt to your workflow and allow you to create custom contact forms in minutes. By using our easy to use <a href="https://wpforms.com/features/drag-drop-online-form-builder/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">drag and drop online form builder</a>, you can easily add custom form fields, rearrange them, and basically create a complete contact form in 5 minutes or less.</p>
<p>But don&#8217;t just take our word. See what one of the WordPress experts are saying:</p>
<blockquote>
<p>WPForms is by far the <strong>easiest form plugin to use</strong>. My clients love WPForms and it&#8217;s one of the few plugins they can use without any training. As a developer I appreciate how fast, modern, clean and extensible it is.<br />
  Bill Erickson &#8211; Expert WordPress Consultant</p>
</blockquote>
<h4>Pre-built Form Templates</h4>
<p>Building contact forms in WordPress can be time consuming. Why?</p>
<p>Because every other WordPress contact form builder plugin requires you to build your contact form from scratch. The truth is it&#8217;s often not necessary to create a contact form completely from scratch unless you really want to.</p>
<p>Whether you&#8217;re looking to create a simple contact form, marketing form, request a quote form, donation form, payment order form, registration form, or a subscription form, we have a form template for you inside our contact form builder.</p>
<p>WPForms comes with <a href="https://wpforms.com/features/form-templates/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">pre-built form templates</a> to help you save time. You can add, remove, or re-arrange fields as necessary.</p>
<p>See <a href="https://wpforms.com/templates/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">300+ Pre-Made WPForms Form Template Demo</a></p>
<h4>Mobile Ready, SEO Friendly and Optimized for Speed</h4>
<p>WPForms&#8217; contact forms are 100% responsive and mobile-friendly by default. We also optimized every query on the front-end and the back-end to ensure maximum speed &#8211; Yes, WPForms is one of the fastest WordPress contact form plugin.</p>
<p>You can embed your contact form on any page with optimized title and description. With the speed and proper formatting, WPForms is also one of the most SEO friendly contact form plugin.</p>
<h4>All the Fields &amp; Features that You Need to Succeed</h4>
<p>From star ratings to file uploads to multi-page contact forms with progress bar, we have all the fields you need.</p>
<p>You can easily integrate your contact forms with an email marketing service or collect payments for bookings and orders. WPForms allows you to do it all.</p>
<p>The best part is, you can do it all without hiring a developer.</p>
<p>See what one business owner has to say about WPForms&#8217; contact form:</p>
<blockquote>
<p>As a business owner, time is my most valuable asset. WPForms allow me to create smart contact forms with just a few clicks. With their pre-built form templates and the drag &amp; drop builder, I can create a new form that works in less than 2 minutes without writing a single line of code. Well worth the investment.<br />
  David Henzel &#8211; Co-founder of MaxCDN</p>
</blockquote>
<h4>Surveys &amp; Polls</h4>
<p>Along with contact form, you can also use WPForms to create surveys and polls.</p>
<p>Our <a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/surveys-and-polls-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">WordPress Survey plugin addon</a> comes with smart survey fields including likert scale, star ratings, multiple choice, Net Promoter Score (NPS), and more, so you can create custom survey forms like Survey Monkey (without the high costs).</p>
<p>WPForms offer the best-in class survey reporting. You can use our interactive reports to customize the graphs, export them for your presentations, and even display the aggregate results to your users.</p>
<p>The best part about WPForms survey reports is that it can retroactively work on any old contact form or feedback survey contact form created with WPForms.</p>
<p>Thousands of businesses love WPForms surveys for creating employee feedback form, customer feedback form, online petition form, and more.</p>
<p>You can also use the surveys &amp; polls addon to easily create a poll on your site. To save you time when creating a user poll, we have added a built-in poll forms template. Our poll feature offers real-time reports, so you can share poll results with the user immediately after they submit their vote.</p>
<p>Just like the contact form, you can embed your surveys and polls inside any post, page, or widget area in WordPress.</p>
<h4>Membership and Default WordPress Forms</h4>
<p>Aside from building simple contact forms which every WordPress site needs, WPForms also helps you create better default WordPress forms.</p>
<p>For example, you can use WPForms to create custom WordPress login forms and custom WordPress user registration forms which are great for <a href="https://www.wpbeginner.com/wp-tutorials/ultimate-guide-to-creating-a-wordpress-membership-site/" rel="nofollow ugc">membership sites</a>.</p>
<p>For membership sites, you can also use WPForms to create a password-protected contact form or even a members only contact form which is restricted to logged-in users only.</p>
<p>Even if you&#8217;re not using a WordPress membership plugin, you can use WPForms to create membership registration forms, online RSVP forms, and other address book contact forms.</p>
<p>Bloggers and publishers can use our WordPress post submission forms to accept guest posts, testimonials contact form to collect testimonials, and partnership agreement forms to grow their business.</p>
<h4>Payment Form, Donation Form, Booking Form, and More</h4>
<p>While WPForms started out as a contact form plugin, it has evolved into a powerful custom forms solution that you can use to create a payment form, donation form, registration form, online booking form, mobile form, and basically any type of custom form you need.</p>
<p>WPForms integrates with both PayPal, Stripe, Square, and Authorize.Net so you can easily create a credit card payment form to accept payments on your website. If you&#8217;re using SSL, then you can use our Stripe, Square, or Authorize.Net Payment forms to accept credit card payments directly on your website. Alternatively you can use our PayPal payment form to make a donation form and accept payments online.</p>
<p>Aside from simple order forms, business owners also use WPForms to create custom product purchase forms, t-shirt order forms, online booking forms, and more.</p>
<p>We understand that sometimes you may need to create a contact form that require a signature. WPForms comes with a signature field to collect user signature on your WordPress forms or even create custom signature forms.</p>
<p>You can do all of this while still using the same easy-to-use contact form builder that&#8217;s loved by over 5 million users.</p>
<blockquote>
<p>I am so impressed with this plugin. I decided to give it a shot over some of the other form plugins, and I am so glad I did. It works well, is so easy to use and customize. The support is amazing on top of it all. I got the pro version because I was so pleased. Highly recommend.<br />
  Micky73 &#8211; WordPress user</p>
</blockquote>
<h4>Forms that are Optimized for Conversion and Results</h4>
<p>With our Form Pages addon, you can create distraction-free custom form landing pages like Google Forms and Wufoo right inside WordPress, so you can increase conversions without the high costs (<a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/form-pages-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">See Form Pages Demo</a>).</p>
<p>To improve form completion rate, we created Conversational Forms&reg; which helps you make your generic feedback form and other custom contact forms feel more human by adding an interactive form layout. Our conversational forms are similar to Typeform without the high subscription costs (<a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/conversational-forms-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">See Conversational Forms Demo</a>).</p>
<p>WPForms also has other conversion optimization features such as our smart form logic that lets you create dynamic contact forms where fields change based on user&#8217;s answer, multi-page contact forms with progress bar, and other advanced contact forms.</p>
<p>WPForms form analytics integration with MonsterInsights allow you to easily track your lead capture forms, newsletter signup forms, request a quote contact form, and other important forms on your site.</p>
<h4>Easy to Customize and Extend</h4>
<p>You can easily customize your contact forms with our section dividers, HTML blocks, and custom CSS.</p>
<p>If you&#8217;re using Elementor or Divi page builders our native integrations let you quickly customize the style of your forms. Embedding forms in Elementor and Divi has never been easier.</p>
<p>We also knew that our developer friends may want to extend simple contact forms further. That&#8217;s why WPForms come with tons of hooks and filters to create custom functionality.</p>
<p>Since contact forms are essential for marketing, WPForms is a must have plugin for every website!</p>
<h4>Full WPForms Feature List</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/features/drag-drop-online-form-builder/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Online Form Builder</a> &#8211; Our powerful drag &amp; drop contact form builder allows you to easily create WordPress contact forms and other online forms in just a few minutes without writing any code.</li>
<li>100% Responsive &#8211; Mobile Friendly contact forms.</li>
<li>GDPR Friendly &#8211; Make your contact form GDPR compatible with just a few clicks.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/features/form-templates/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Form Templates</a> &#8211; Use our pre-built form templates to save time. Never start from scratch again (see all <a href="https://wpforms.com/templates/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">form templates demos</a>).</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/features/spam-protection/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Spam Protection</a> &#8211; WPForms provides smart anti-spam protection out-of-the-box, plus direct integrations with hCaptcha and Google reCAPTCHA.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/features/instant-notifications/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Instant Form Notification</a> &#8211; Quickly respond to incoming inquiries with our instant contact form notification system.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/features/form-confirmation/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Smart Form Confirmation</a> &#8211; Show a custom success message, or redirect users to a custom thank you page.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/features/file-uploads/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">File Uploads</a> &#8211; Collect files and media through your contact forms with File Uploads.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/features/multi-page-forms/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Multi-Page Forms</a> &#8211; Split long forms into multiple pages with progress bar to improve user experience.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/features/conditional-logic/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Smart Conditional Logic</a> &#8211; Show or hide fields and contact form sections based on user behavior.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/signature-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Signature Forms</a> &#8211; Create signature forms or add the signature field to your contact form, application form, booking form, etc.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/user-registration-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">User Registration Forms</a> &#8211; Create custom user registration form and custom login form in WordPress.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/post-submissions-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Post Submissions</a> &#8211; Collect user-submitted content in WordPress with our front-end post submission form. Great for guest posts, testimonials, business directory, listings, etc.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/geolocation-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Geolocation</a> &#8211; Display location information about your users.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/custom-catpcha-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Custom Captchas</a> &#8211; Create custom captchas for your contact form.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/surveys-and-polls-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Surveys and Polls</a> &#8211; Easily create surveys forms and analyze the data with interactive reports.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/form-abandonment-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Form Abandonment</a> &#8211; Unlock more leads and grow your business with partial-form submission.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/form-locker-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Form Locker</a> &#8211; Manage form permissions and add access control rules including password-protected forms, members only forms, limit contact form entry per person, close form after specific date / time, etc.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/offline-forms-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Offline Forms</a> &#8211; Let your visitors save their entered data offline and submit when their internet connection is restored.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/form-pages-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Form Landing Pages</a> &#8211; Create &#8220;distraction-free&#8221; form landing pages to boost conversions. Great Google Forms and Wufoo alternative.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/conversational-forms-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Conversational Forms</a> &#8211; Interactive form layout that makes your form feels more human and boost overall completion rate. Great for surveys and registration forms. Perfect Typeform alternative for WordPress without the high costs.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/webhooks-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Webhooks</a> &#8211; Send form entry data to secondary tools and external services. No code required, and no need for a third party connector.</li>
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/user-journey-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">User Journey Reporting</a> &#8211; Discover the steps your visitors take before they submit your forms. Right in the WordPress dashboard, you can easily see the content that’s driving the most valuable form conversions.</li>
</ul>

Route your contact form data to your favorite CRM, email marketing service, etc.</li>
