";s:12:"installation";s:739:"<ol>
<li>Install WPForms Lite either via the WordPress.org plugin repository or by uploading the files to your server. (See instructions on <a href="https://www.wpbeginner.com/beginners-guide/step-by-step-guide-to-install-a-wordpress-plugin-for-beginners/" rel="friend nofollow ugc">how to install a WordPress plugin</a>)</li>
<li>Activate WPForms Lite.</li>
<li>Navigate to the WPForms tab at the bottom of your admin menu and click the &#8220;Add New&#8221; button to begin creating your new WordPress contact form.</li>
<li>Want more features? <a href="https://wpforms.com/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" title="WPForms" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Purchase the full version of WPForms</a>!</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:8780:"
<dt id='who%20should%20use%20wpforms%3F'>
Who should use WPForms?
</h4>
<p>
<p>WPForms is perfect for business owners, bloggers, designers, developers, photographers, and basically everyone else. If you want to create a custom WordPress form, then you need to use the WPForms drag &amp; drop form builder.</p>
</p>
<dt id='do%20i%20need%20to%20have%20coding%20skills%20to%20use%20wpforms%3F'>
Do I need to have coding skills to use WPForms?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Absolutely not. You can create and manage forms without any coding knowledge (100% drag &amp; drop form builder). WPForms is the most beginner friendly contact form plugin in the market.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20type%20of%20wordpress%20forms%20can%20i%20build%20with%20wpforms%3F'>
What type of WordPress forms can I build with WPForms?
</h4>
<p>
<p>WPForms drag &amp; drop form builder combined with our addons is the most powerful WordPress contact form plugin in the market. Here are some types of WordPress forms you can create:</p>
<ul>
<li>Simple Contact Forms</li>
<li>Job Application Contact Form</li>
<li>Feedback Survey Contact Form</li>
<li>Make a Suggestion Contact Form</li>
<li>Change Request Forms</li>
<li>Online Booking Forms</li>
<li>Event Booking Form</li>
<li>Video Release Forms</li>
<li>PTO Request Contact Form</li>
<li>Maintenance Request Contact Form</li>
<li>Scholarship Application Forms</li>
<li>File Download Forms</li>
<li>Employment Verification Forms</li>
<li>Make a Referral Contact Form</li>
<li>Volunteer Registration Contact Form</li>
<li>Offline Contact Form</li>
</ul>
<p>To see a full list, visit our <a href="https://wpforms.com/templates/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Form Template Gallery</a> which has over 150+ pre-made contact form templates.</p>
</p>
<dt id='which%20form%20fields%20does%20wpforms%20offer%3F'>
Which Form Fields Does WPForms offer?
</h4>
<p>
<p>We made WPForms form builder to be both easy and powerful.</p>
<p>Here are the contact form fields that comes with WPForms Form Builder (also known as Standard Fields):</p>
<ul>
<li>Text Field</li>
<li>Paragraph Text (Textarea)</li>
<li>Dropdown Field</li>
<li>Multiple Choice (Radio Buttons)</li>
<li>Checkboxes</li>
<li>Numbers Field</li>
<li>Name Field</li>
<li>Email Address Field</li>
<li>Number Slider Field</li>
</ul>
<p>Here is a list of our advanced contact form builder fields (Fancy Fields):</p>
<ul>
<li>Website / URL Field</li>
<li>Address Field</li>
<li>Password Field</li>
<li>Smart Phone Field with international format verification</li>
<li>Date / Time Field</li>
<li>Hidden Field</li>
<li>HTML Field &#8211; add Custom HTML inside your form</li>
<li>File Upload &#8211; Great for File Upload Form</li>
<li>Page Break Field &#8211; Great for Multi Page Contact Form with Progress Bar</li>
<li>Section Divider &#8211; Great for Long Contact Forms</li>
<li>Entry Preview &#8211; Allow your form users to preview their form entries before they&#8217;ve submitted them</li>
<li>Rich Text &#8211; Add a WYSIWYG field, perfect for guest blog post forms</li>
<li>Signature Field &#8211; Great for Contracts and Booking Forms</li>
<li>Star Rating &#8211; Great for Survey Forms and Polls</li>
<li>Likert Scale &#8211; Great for Survey Forms</li>
<li>Net Promoter Score (NPS Field) &#8211; Great for Survey Forms</li>
<li>Questions CAPTCHA &#8211; Great for Preventing Contact Form Spam</li>
<li>Math CAPTCHA &#8211; Great for Preventing Contact Form Spam</li>
<li>Google ReCAPTCHA &#8211; Great for Preventing Contact Form Spam</li>
<li>hCAPTCHA &#8211; Great for Preventing Contact Form Spam</li>
</ul>
<p>Here is a list of our Payment Fields that will help you create a order form, donation form, booking form, and other payment forms:</p>
<ul>
<li>Single Item</li>
<li>Multiple Items</li>
<li>Checkbox Items</li>
<li>Dropdown Items</li>
<li>Total (Calculation Field)</li>
<li>Credit Card (Stripe, Square, and Authorize.Net)</li>
<li>PayPal</li>
</ul>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20integrate%20wpforms%20with%20my%20crm%20or%20email%20marketing%20service%3F'>
Can I integrate WPForms with my CRM or Email Marketing Service?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, WPForms offers seamless integration with over 1,000+ popular <a href="https://www.wpbeginner.com/showcase/best-email-marketing-services/" rel="nofollow ugc">email marketing</a> and <a href="https://www.wpbeginner.com/showcase/best-crm-software-for-small-businesses-compared/" rel="nofollow ugc">CRM software</a>.</p>
<p>You can easily send data from your contact form and other WordPress forms to your favorite CRM, email newsletter, and other marketing platforms.</p>
<p>Here is a list of our popular marketing integrations:</p>
<ul>
<li>Mailchimp</li>
<li>Constant Contact</li>
<li>AWeber</li>
<li>Drip</li>
<li>Campaign Monitor</li>
<li>GetResponse</li>
<li>ActiveCampaign</li>
<li>Zapier</li>
<li>Salesforce CRM</li>
<li>Sendinblue</li>
</ul>
<p>Using our Zapier integration, you can easily connect WPForms with over 1000+ marketing apps including:</p>
<ul>
<li>PipeDrive CRM</li>
<li>HubSpot Email Marketing</li>
<li>HubSpot CRM</li>
<li>Google Sheets</li>
<li>Active Campaign</li>
<li>Zoho CRM</li>
<li>Zoho Mail</li>
<li>Zoho Invoice</li>
<li>Agile CRM</li>
<li>Slack</li>
<li>Trello</li>
<li>Infusionsoft by Keap</li>
<li>Microsoft Excel</li>
<li>Dropbox</li>
<li>HelpScout</li>
<li>Zendesk</li>
<li>Freshbooks</li>
<li>Freshsales</li>
<li>Intercom</li>
<li>Click Funnels</li>
<li>Microsoft Dynamics 365 CRM</li>
<li>Capsule CRM</li>
<li>Insightly CRM</li>
<li>Printfection</li>
<li>Acuity Scheduling</li>
<li>Quickbooks Online</li>
</ul>
<p>See all <a href="https://zapier.com/apps/wpforms/integrations" rel="nofollow ugc">WPForms Zapier Integrations</a>.</p>
<p>Note: WPForms was voted Zapier&#8217;s 8th fastest growing app in the world.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20create%20a%20payment%20form%20with%20wpforms'>
Can I create a Payment Form with WPForms
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, WPForms is not your average contact form plugin. You can use it to create any type of form including payment forms.</p>
<p>We make it easy for you to accept payments using Stripe, Authorize.Net, and PayPal.</p>
<p>Both our Stripe and Authorize.Net integrations helps you easily accept credit card payments online.</p>
<p>Our PayPal integration allows you to accept PayPal payments online.</p>
</p>
<dt id='can%20i%20import%20%2F%20export%20forms%20with%20wpforms%3F'>
Can I Import / Export Forms with WPForms?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, WPForms makes it easy to import / export your contact forms and other WordPress forms created with WPForms form builder. This is incredibly useful for developers and agencies who are building websites for clients.</p>
<p>You can also create custom form templates that you can use on client websites. For more see our documentation.</p>
<p>Aside from that, WPForms also allows you to import forms from other WordPress Contact Form plugins such as Contact Form 7, Ninja Forms, and Pirate Forms.</p>
<p>If you&#8217;re not happy with your WordPress contact form plugin, then definitely give WPForms a try!</p>
</p>
<dt id='i%27d%20like%20access%20to%20all%20features.%20how%20can%20i%20get%20them%3F'>
I&#8217;d like access to all features. How can I get them?
</h4>
<p>
<p>You can get access to more features, addons and support by <a href="https://wpforms.com/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" title="Click here to learn more about WPForms!" rel="friend nofollow ugc">upgrading to our Pro version</a>. Purchasing a Pro license gets you access to the full version of WPForms, automatic updates, priority support, and all WPForms Addons!</p>
</p>
<dt id='is%20wpforms%20translation%20ready%3F'>
Is WPForms translation ready?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, WPForms has full translation and localization support via the wpforms textdomain. All .mo and .po translation files should go into the languages folder in the base of the plugin. The same is true for every WPForms Addon as well.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20wpforms%20include%20spam%20protection%3F'>
Does WPForms include spam protection?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, WPForms includes spam protection which is enabled on all forms by default in the form settings.</p>
<p>Additionally, Google reCAPTCHA is also supported and can be setup at WPForms &gt; Settings &gt; reCAPTCHA.</p>
<p>WPForms is fully compatible with all versions of Google reCAPTCHA:</p>
<ul>
<li>Checkbox reCAPTCHA v2</li>
<li>Invisible reCAPTCHA v2</li>
<li>reCAPTCHA v3</li>
</ul>
<p>Lastly, <a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/custom-catpcha-addon/?utm_source=wprepo&amp;utm_medium=link&amp;utm_campaign=liteplugin" rel="friend nofollow ugc">Custom Captchas</a> are available which allow you to create math or question based captchas for your contact forms.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:21408:"<h4>1.7.1.2</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Edge case when form tokens (anti-spam protection) failed verification at certain time of a new day.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.7.1.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>Changed: Improved translations by removing confusion if non-translatable placeholders are used.</li>
<li>Changed: Improved support for WordPress Core UI colors and admin themes in the admin bar menu.</li>
<li>Changed: Improved display of empty and hidden field labels in Form Builder preview.</li>
<li>Changed: Field helper notification in the Form Builder now can be dismissed.</li>
<li>Changed: Improved and standardized look of classic and modern Dropdown field across Form Builder, admin area, and frontend.</li>
<li>Fixed: Strip slashes from Paragraph Text field when the value is dynamically populated.</li>
<li>Fixed: SMTP settings page linked to Setup Wizard even when SMTP settings are already configured.</li>
<li>Fixed: Notifications count in the admin bar is misaligned.</li>
<li>Fixed: Field helper notification in the Form Builder overlaps and blocks Duplicate and Delete actions when hovered.</li>
<li>Fixed: Non-latin (Punycode) email addresses are not converted for display in email suggestion hints.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.7.0</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: Uncanny Automator integration.</li>
<li>Changed: Updated jQuery Validation library to v1.9.3.</li>
<li>Fixed: Incorrect handling of language files downloads when the plugin is activated, or site language is changed.</li>
<li>Fixed: Alignment for admin notification counter.</li>
<li>Fixed: Javascript error in Elementor page builder.</li>
<li>Fixed: Embedded forms into global sidebar report about an error in the Divi page builder.</li>
<li>Fixed: Change settings were not applied for a Duplicated Modern Dropdown field.</li>
<li>Fixed: Form fields not displaying full width on mobile devices with Base form styling selected.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.9</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: Keyboard Shortcuts informational popup in the Form Builder, triggered with <code>Ctrl + /</code> shortcut.</li>
<li>Added: Separate category for templates added by addons.</li>
<li>Added: Smart Tags support in Confirmation Messages.</li>
<li>Added: Punycode support for the Email field to allow using international domain names.</li>
<li>Added: Compatibility with PHP 8.</li>
<li>Changed: Display only WPForms related actions on the Tools &gt; Scheduled Actions page.</li>
<li>Changed: Enable AJAX form submission by default for new forms created using Blank template and addon templates.</li>
<li>Changed: Default state on the CAPTCHA Settings screen on new installs is now set to None.</li>
<li>Changed: Improved consistency of various modal popups in the Form Builder.</li>
<li>Changed: Speed up form preview in the Form Builder by limiting the number of choices displayed.</li>
<li>Changed: Updated ActionScheduler library to 3.2.1.</li>
<li>Fixed: Missing down arrow in the Dropdown field in the Twenty Twenty-One theme on a fresh install.</li>
<li>Fixed: Clicking on the Field Options tab in the Form Builder always opens options for the first field in the form.</li>
<li>Fixed: Form Setting panels can be broken by horizontally resizing textarea fields.</li>
<li>Fixed: Insert/edit link button not working in the Confirmation Message editor.</li>
<li>Fixed: Prevent editor styles from loading on various settings pages.</li>
<li>Fixed: Missing Conditional Logic class in the Lite version causing errors when using custom integration that extends the <code>WPForms_Provider</code> class.</li>
<li>Fixed: Console error in Chrome when re-ordering choices in the Dropdown, Checkboxes and Multiple Choice field settings.</li>
<li>Fixed: Unrelated admin notices are no longer displayed on the WPForms admin pages.</li>
<li>Fixed: Modern Dropdown field not initialized properly in the Divi Builder.</li>
<li>Fixed: Dropdown preview in the Form Builder not updated if the first option&#8217;s value is empty.</li>
<li>Fixed: Preserve reply-to in the Notifications settings when creating a form from a template.</li>
<li>Fixed: Minor button styling issue in WordPress 4.9.</li>
<li>Fixed: Avoid error by allowing objects implementing the <code>__invoke()</code> method as a hook callback.</li>
<li>Fixed: Various Dropdown field CSS issues in the Form Builder.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.8.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>Changed: Allow using right-click to open a form preview in a new tab or window.</li>
<li>Fixed: Notifications disabled on the previous version were enabled after the 1.6.8 update.</li>
<li>Fixed: Block preview in new WordPress 5.8 Widgets Block Editor now aligned properly.</li>
<li>Fixed: Word wrapping issues in various places for non-English languages.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.8</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: Form Builder visual modernization and improved user experience.</li>
<li>Added: Form Builder is now more optimized, loading and performing faster.</li>
<li>Added: More tooltips in various areas of the Form Builder to provide context for different options.</li>
<li>Added: A lot more Templates that you can use for one-click forms creation.</li>
<li>Added: Categorize Form Templates into different sections and improve search, allowing faster access and better user experience.</li>
<li>Added: New Preview button for all Templates, so you can check how your form will look like before applying the Template.</li>
<li>Changed: Dropped support for IE11 in the Form Builder (same as WordPress 5.8).</li>
<li>Changed: Introducing tabs instead of accordion for Field Options in the Form Builder: General, Advanced, Smart Logic.</li>
<li>Changed: Allow underscore symbol usage in Allowlist/Denylist in Email field.</li>
<li>Changed: Updated DOMPurify lib to 2.3.0.</li>
<li>Fixed: A lot of visual inconsistencies inside the Form Builder.</li>
<li>Fixed: TinyMCE editor in the default Confirmation has 2 tabs (Visual, Text), which previously had incorrect height.</li>
<li>Fixed: Firefox-specific issue that prevents fields from being drag-n-dropped inside the Preview area of the Form Builder.</li>
<li>Fixed: Form Builder performance issue with large number of choices added to option fields.</li>
<li>Fixed: Missing down arrow in Dropdown field in Twenty Twenty-One theme.</li>
<li>Fixed: Checkboxes and Multiple Choice input fields rendered incorrectly in Twenty Twenty-One theme.</li>
<li>Fixed: Breaking words when wrapping in Modern Dropdown field.</li>
<li>Fixed: Download all relevant translations when initiating an upgrade from Lite to Pro on the plugin Settings page.</li>
<li>Fixed: Preserve line breaks when pasting blocks of text into Paragraph field with word limit option enabled.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.7.3</h4>
<ul>
<li>Changed: Renamed a misspelled <code>wpforms_display_sumbit_spinner_src</code> filter to <code>wpforms_display_submit_spinner_src</code>, old name is now deprecated.</li>
<li>Fixed: Expired transients are not deleted automatically.</li>
<li>Fixed: Entries count race condition under high load in the plugin Lite version.</li>
<li>Fixed: Form Builder product education links.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.7.2</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Admin notice option flag reference.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.7.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>Changed: Improved logic of pasting a text in the fields with word and character limits.</li>
<li>Changed: Updated DOMPurify lib to 2.2.9.</li>
<li>Changed: Some admin notices can be dismissed on a per-user basis.</li>
<li>Fixed: Smart Tags don&#8217;t parse dot and comma symbols well.</li>
<li>Fixed: In rare cases, WPForms functions calls are not handled correctly inside the third-party frontend AJAX calls.</li>
<li>Fixed: Incorrect <code>wpforms_smart_tag_process</code> filter deprecation notice.</li>
<li>Fixed: Compatibility with the Elementor 3.1.x, 3.2.x and 3.3.x.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.7</h4>
<ul>
<li>Changed: Email Summaries can now be tweaked via the hook to have multiple &#8220;To&#8221; recipients.</li>
<li>Changed: Email Summaries subject line is changed to reduce a chance of going into spam folder.</li>
<li>Changed: Rewrote inline captcha scripts in vanilla JS to improve its compatibility with a third-party code.</li>
<li>Changed: Replaced jQuery.isFunction() (deprecated as of jQuery 3.3) usages with a recommended counterpart.</li>
<li>Changed: Refine smart tags system to improve extensibility.</li>
<li>Changed: Each addon title is linked to a related documentation on the Addons page.</li>
<li>Changed: Externally disabled fields are displayed inside the Form Builder as dismissible notices.</li>
<li>Changed: Updated DOMPurify lib to 2.2.8.</li>
<li>Fixed: Inconsistent Form Builder JS events loading order in jQuery 3+ across different browsers.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.6</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: WordPress 5.7 new color scheme compatibility.</li>
<li>Changed: Allow using 0/false values in choices label for Checkboxes, Multiple Choice, Dropdown fields.</li>
<li>Changed: Better AJAX form submit error messages handling for the Email field.</li>
<li>Changed: Refactored Tools page with all of its subpages for easier long-term support.</li>
<li>Changed: Updated the WPForms &gt; About Us page.</li>
<li>Changed: Updated DOMPurify lib to 2.2.7.</li>
<li>Changed: Replaced jQuery.ready() function usage with a recommended way since jQuery 3.0.</li>
<li>Fixed: HTML layout is broken on the Analytics page for some site languages.</li>
<li>Fixed: Incorrect permission checks for different places in the dashboard and the Form Builder.</li>
<li>Fixed: RTL support for Name, Email fields.</li>
<li>Fixed: Speed up the Form Builder rendering by loading certain scripts only when the Embed functionality is triggered.</li>
<li>Fixed: The <code>iframe</code> HTML element was rendered incorrectly in the Twenty Twenty theme.</li>
<li>Fixed: The Checkboxes and Multiple Choice fields CSS issues in Twenty Twenty-One theme.</li>
<li>Fixed: WPForms Challenge was drunk in the Firefox browser.</li>
<li>Fixed: reCAPTCHA doesn&#8217;t render in a popup when the same form exists in another place.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.5</h4>
<ul>

<li>Fixed: The Gutenberg block JavaScript issue in WordPress 5.0-5.1.1 versions.</li>

<li>Fixed: Minor styling issues on the WPForms &gt; Tools &gt; Logs page.</li>
<li>Fixed: Issues while importing forms saved in UTF-8 with BOM.</li>
<li>Fixed: Improve performance of the WPForms Challenge.</li>

<li>Fixed: Compatibility with WordPress 4.9 on the WPForms &gt; Analytics/SMTP pages.</li>
<li>Fixed: AJAX form submissions on some server configuration.</li>
<li>Fixed: Improve Admin Menu Bar support since WordPress 5.2.</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.6.4</h4>

<li>Fixed: Refresh the list of form fields that are required to properly render marketing addons.</li>
<li>Fixed: &#8220;Invalid Form&#8221; error for logged out users upon submitting an AJAX form on some server configurations.</li>

<li>Fixed: Input mask validation produces a JS error on jQuery 3.x.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.1</h4>
<ul>

<li>Fixed: Remove all the plugin-related information on uninstall from the DB when opted-in in plugin settings.</li>
<li>Fixed: Replace all new lines characters with spaces in notification email subjects (e.g., when an address field value is used in a subject via a smart tag).</li>
<li>Fixed: Make sure the plugin doesn&#8217;t crash when <code>iconv</code> PHP extension is not installed on a server.</li>
<li>Fixed: Properly handle fields with choices with new lines in their labels when connected to Conditional Logic.</li>
<li>Fixed: Google Invisible v2 reCAPTCHA should show Submit Button Processing Text when the form is submitted.</li>
<li>Fixed: Display the list of countries in the &#8220;Countries&#8221; preset and in the Address field in alphabetical order regardless of the current site language.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.0.2</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: The default value 0 (zero) of the Paragraph Text field does not display on the frontend.</li>
<li>Fixed: Product education URL encoding issues.</li>
<li>Fixed: Securely store WPForms anonymized cookie, so it cannot be sent along with cross-site requests (samesite).</li>
<li>Fixed: Various PHP notices that may appear during wildly complicated forms submissions.</li>
<li>Fixed: Improved escaping inside Form Builder live preview, props Fortinet Fortiguard Labs.</li>
<li>Fixed: Incorrect interval value was used when running a cleanup job after notifications sent.</li>
<li>Fixed: Delete orphaned plugin translation files when cleanup option in plugin settings is checked and the plugin is deleted from the site.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.6.0.1</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: Admin bar menu item.</li>
<li>Added: Form Builder alert when using browser &#8220;Back&#8221; button if form contains unsaved changes.</li>

<li>Changed: Async form notification emails are now off by default.</li>

<li>Fixed: Error if there are some plugins or themes add <code>widget_title</code> filter.</li>
<li>Fixed: Choice Images not displaying in form notifications if no label is set.</li>
<li>Fixed: Form Builder &#8220;drag zone&#8221; not available when all fields are deleted.</li>
<li>Fixed: Empty <code>div</code> appended to end of form display.</li>
<li>Fixed: Block alignment issues (WordPress 5.4+).</li>
<li>Fixed: Form Builder field option panel is not available if field is placed before the last form field.</li>
<li>Fixed: Fallback population for fields with choices (checkbox, radio etc) when special characters are used.</li>
<li>Fixed: Integrity of decoded data with additional sanitizing.</li>
<li>Fixed: Compatibility issues with Elementor.</li>
</ul>

";s:11:"screenshots";s:1341:"<ol><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/wpforms-lite/assets/screenshot-1.png?rev=2578465"><img src="https://ps.w.org/wpforms-lite/assets/screenshot-1.png?rev=2578465" alt="WPForms Drag &amp; Drop Online Form Builder"></a><p>WPForms Drag &amp; Drop Online Form Builder</p></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/wpforms-lite/assets/screenshot-2.gif?rev=2578465"><img src="https://ps.w.org/wpforms-lite/assets/screenshot-2.gif?rev=2578465" alt="Adding New Field"></a><p>Adding New Field</p></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/wpforms-lite/assets/screenshot-3.png?rev=1815766"><img src="https://ps.w.org/wpforms-lite/assets/screenshot-3.png?rev=1815766" alt="Form Preview"></a><p>Form Preview</p></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/wpforms-lite/assets/screenshot-4.png?rev=2578465"><img src="https://ps.w.org/wpforms-lite/assets/screenshot-4.png?rev=2578465" alt="Form Settings"></a><p>Form Settings</p></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/wpforms-lite/assets/screenshot-5.gif?rev=2037397"><img src="https://ps.w.org/wpforms-lite/assets/screenshot-5.gif?rev=2037397" alt="Conversational Forms addon"></a><p>Conversational Forms addon</p></li><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/wpforms-lite/assets/screenshot-6.png?rev=2037397"><img src="https://ps.w.org/wpforms-lite/assets/screenshot-6.png?rev=2037397" alt="Form Pages addon"></a><p>Form Pages addon</p></li></ol>";}s:17:"short_description";s:145:"The best WordPress contact form plugin. Thumbnails Advanced";s:4:"slug";s:30:"regenerate-thumbnails-advanced";s:7:"version";s:5:"2.4.0";s:6:"author";s:48:"<a href="https://shortpixel.com/">ShortPixel</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:42:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/shortpixel/";s:8:"requires";s:3:"4.0";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.7.4";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.3";s:6:"rating";i:78;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:19;i:4;i:0;i:3;i:1;i:2;i:0;i:1;i:7;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:27;s:15:"support_threads";i:4;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:4;s:10:"downloaded";i:773165;s:12:"last_updated";s:22:"2021-03-09 12:22pm GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2015-07-10";s:8:"homepage";s:0:"";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:2405:"<p><strong>A free, fast and easy to use regenerate thumbnails plugin supported by ShortPixel 🙂</strong></p>
<p>Regenerate Thumbnails Advanced (RTA) plugin comes in handy when you install a new WordPress theme on your site that has different image sizes. While the newly uploaded images will be cropped and resized to fit your new theme, the old thumbnails will remain unchanged. Using RTA you can regenerate the thumbnails for all your existing images.<br />
It is also very useful when you have many not-used-anymore thumbnails and you want to remove them while making sure you have all the needed thumbnails generated.</p>
<p>Features:</p>
<ul>
<li>Choose the quality of the regenerated thumbs.</li>
<li>Option to remove not-used-anymore thumbnails.</li>
<li>Remove metadata for missing images and thumbnails</li>
<li>Fully integrated with <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/shortpixel-image-optimiser/">ShortPixel Image Optimizer</a>.</li>
<li>Option to select the thumbnail size for featured and non-featured images.</li>
<li>Option to easily add as many extra thumbnail sizes as you wish.</li>
<li>Interval selection (last day, week, month, all) for the thumbs that will be regenerated.</li>
<li>Clean and simple interface where you have a progress bar showing you the percentage of images regenerated.</li>
<li>Resume function &#8211; the regeneration process will continue from where it was left in case you accidentally close the processing tab in your browser.</li>
</ul>
<p>Support:<br />
For support please contact us <a href="https://shortpixel.com/contact" rel="nofollow ugc">here</a> making sure you mention RTA plugin.</p>
<p><strong>Other plugins by ShortPixel</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Image optimization &amp; compression for all the images on your site, including WebP delivery &#8211; <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/shortpixel-image-optimiser/">ShortPixel Image Optimizer</a></li>
<li>Image optimization &amp; CDN on the fly &#8211; <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/shortpixel-adaptive-images/">ShortPixel Adaptive Images</a></li>
<li>Easily replace images or files in Media Library &#8211; <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/enable-media-replace/">Enable Media Replace</a></li>
<li>Make sure you don&#8217;t have huge images in your Media Library &#8211; <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/resize-image-after-upload/">Resize Image After Upload</a></li>
</ul>
";s:12:"installation";s:261:"<p>Nothing special about the installation process, just visit &#8220;Plugins&#8221; section in your /wp-admin, search for &#8220;regenerate thumbnails advanced&#8221;, install &amp; activate the plugin and then from Settings section you can start using it.</p>
";s:3:"faq";s:494:"
<dt id='can%20i%20regenerate%20just%20a%20few%20images'>
Can I regenerate just a few images
</h4>
<p>
<p>You have the option to select from: all, past day, past week, past month</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20happens%20if%20i%20close%20the%20page%20while%20the%20regeneration%20process%20is%20running%3F'>
What happens if I close the page while the regeneration process is running?
</h4>
<p>
<p>The script stops but it will resume after you open the settings page of the plugin once again.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:3102:"<h4>2.4.0</h4>
<p>Release date: December 1st 2020<br />
* New: Pause Button;<br />
* New: Resuming process from another page now starts paused;<br />
* New: Added Filter for increasing number of items processed per run;<br />
* Fix: Users optimizing more than 50K images could run into a code loop protection.</p>
<h4>2.3.2</h4>
<p>Release date: August 17th 2020<br />
* Fix : Regenerate Period now calculates from time set in WordPress to respect timezone settting.</p>
<h4>2.3.1</h4>
<p>Release date: July 13th 2020<br />
* Fix: PHP warning that was displayed on PHP 7.4.x.</p>
<h4>2.3.0</h4>
<p>Release date:  29th May 2020<br />
* New system for queuing which should be more efficient;<br />
* New &#8211; Added regenerate thumbnails button in edit-attachment screen;<br />
* Fixed &#8211; Crash when regenerating image from edit media;<br />
* Fixed &#8211; Queries for large amount of images should not timeout;<br />
* Fixes for the responsiveness of the regeneration screen;<br />
* Class loader moved to PSR-4.</p>
<h4>2.2.0</h4>
<p>Release date: 9th March 2020<br />
* Reworked and improved the process interface<br />
* Option in media library to regenerate just one image<br />
* Will check for post_mime_type in posts and fix it when it&#8217;s empty.<br />
* Cookie-based processing removed, now keeps progress as a server setting<br />
* Internal processes optimized.<br />
* Fixed &#8211; WordPress 5.3 image handling and scaled images<br />
* Fixed &#8211; Metadata not being removed in some cases when &#8220;Delete Leftover Image Metadata&#8221; is checked.<br />
* Fixed &#8211; Logger doesn&#8217;t call wp_upload_dir when not debugging</p>
<h4>2.1.0</h4>
<p>Release date: 7th June 2019<br />
* Replace the two options Exact size for featured/non-featured images with one checkbox Only featured<br />
* Button to stop the regeneration<br />
* Make Keep existing be checked by default<br />
* Change &#8220;Regenerate selected thumbnails&#8221; checklist to a settings selection<br />
* ShortPixel Image Optimizer integration &#8211; call the &#8216;shortpixel-thumbnails-regenerated&#8217; action passing only the changed sizes<br />
* Fix: Security &#8211; Image sizes XSS exploit<br />
* Fix: count(): Parameter must be an array</p>
<h4>2.0.1</h4>
<p>Release date: 17th April 2019<br />
* Fix warnings related to corrupted metadata in some cases</p>
<h4>2.0.0</h4>
<p>Release date: 16th April 2019<br />
* Plugin completely rewritten with additional features added:<br />
* Add custom thumbnails<br />
* Select which thumbnails to regenerate<br />
* Regenerate thumbnails only for the featured images<br />
* Rewrite the existing thumbnails or not depending on the selected options<br />
* Integrate seamlessly with <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/shortpixel-image-optimiser/">ShortPixel Image Optimizer</a><br />
* Delete unused thumbnails from disk<br />
* Remove metadata for missing images and thumbnails</p>
<h4>EARLIER VERSIONS</h4>
<ul>
<li>please refer to the changelog.txt file inside the plugin archive for the versions before the 2.0.0 full rewrite.</li>
</ul>
";s:11:"screenshots";s:265:"<ol><li><a href="https://ps.w.org/regenerate-thumbnails-advanced/assets/screenshot-1.png?rev=2069168"><img https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/regenerate-thumbnails-advanced.2.0.0.zip";s:5:"2.0.1";s:79:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/regenerate-thumbnails-advanced.2.0.1.zip";s:5:"2.1.0";s:79:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/regenerate-thumbnails-advanced.2.1.0.zip";s:5:"2.2.0";s:79:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/regenerate-thumbnails-advanced.2.2.0.zip";s:5:"2.3.0";s:79:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/regenerate-thumbnails-advanced.2.3.0.zip";s:5:"2.3.1";s:79:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/regenerate-thumbnails-advanced.2.3.1.zip";s:5:"2.3.2";s:79:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/regenerate-thumbnails-advanced.2.3.2.zip";s:5:"2.4.0";s:79:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/regenerate-thumbnails-advanced.2.4.0.zip";s:5:"trunk";s:73:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/regenerate-thumbnails-advanced.zip";}s:11:"donate_link";s:33:"https://www.paypal.me/resizeImage";s:5:"icons";a:2:{s:2:"1x";s:83:"https://ps.w.org/regenerate-thumbnails-advanced/assets/icon-128x128.png?rev=1941417";s:2:"2x";s:83:"https://ps.w.org/regenerate-thumbnails-advanced/assets/icon-256x256.png?rev=1941417";}s:12:"contributors";a:0:{}s:6:"market";N;s:11:"custom_link";N;}s:19:"wp-maintenance-mode";a:28:{s:4:"name";s:19:"WP Maintenance Mode";s:4:"slug";s:19:"wp-maintenance-mode";s:7:"version";s:5:"2.4.1";s:6:"author";s:48:"<a href="https://designmodo.com/">Designmodo</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:42:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/designmodo/";s:8:"requires";s:3:"3.5";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.8.2";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.6";s:6:"rating";i:86;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:219;i:4;i:24;i:3;i:17;i:2;i:9;i:1;i:29;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:298;s:15:"support_threads";i:5;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:5;s:10:"downloaded";i:8798095;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2021-07-20 7:43am GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2010-02-26";s:8:"homepage";s:23:"https://designmodo.com/";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:1515:"<p>Add a maintenance page to your blog that lets visitors know your blog is down for maintenance, or add a coming soon page for a new website. User with admin rights gets full access to the blog including the front end.</p>
<p>Activate the plugin and your blog is in maintenance-mode, works and only registered users with enough rights can see the front end. You can use a date with a countdown timer for visitor information or set a value and unit for information.</p>
<p>Also works with WordPress Multisite installs (each blog from the network has it&#8217;s own maintenance settings).</p>
<h4>Features</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fully customizable (change colors, texts and backgrounds);</li>
<li>Subscription form (export emails to .csv file);</li>
<li>Countdown timer (remaining time);</li>
<li>Contact form (receive emails from visitors);</li>
<li>Coming soon page;</li>
<li>Landing page templates;</li>
<li>WordPress multisite;</li>
<li>Responsive design;</li>
<li>Social media icons;</li>
<li>Works with any WordPress theme;</li>
<li>SEO options;</li>
<li>Exclude URLs from maintenance;</li>
<li>Bot functionality to collect the emails in a friendly and efficient way;</li>
<li>GDPR Ready;</li>
</ul>
<h4>Bugs, technical hints or contribute</h4>
<p>Please give us feedback, contribute and file technical bugs on <a href="https://github.com/andrianvaleanu/WP-Maintenance-Mode" rel="nofollow ugc">GitHub Repo</a>.</p>
<h4>Credits</h4>
<p>Developed by <a href="https://designmodo.com" rel="nofollow ugc">Designmodo</a></p>
";s:12:"installation";s:362:"<ol>
<li>Unpack the download package</li>
<li>Upload all files to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory, include folders</li>
<li>Activate the plugin through the &#8216;Plugins&#8217; menu in WordPress</li>
<li>Go to <code>Settings</code> page, where you can change what settings you need (pay attention to <strong>Exclude</strong> option!)</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:845:"
<dt id='how%20to%20use%20plugin%20filters'>
How to use plugin filters
</h4>
<p>
<p>Check out our <a href="https://github.com/WP-Maintenance-Mode/Snippet-Library/" rel="nofollow ugc">Snippet Library</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='cache%20plugin%20support'>
Cache Plugin Support
</h4>
<p>
<p>WP Maintenance Mode can be unstable due to the cache plugins; we recommend deactivating any cache plugin when maintenance mode is active. If you <strong>really</strong> want to use a cache plugin, make sure you delete the entire cache after each change.</p>
</p>
<dt id='exclude%20list'>
Exclude list
</h4>
<p>
<p>If you change your login url, please add the new slug (url: http://domain.com/newlogin, then you should add: newlogin) to Exclude list from plugin settings -&gt; General Tab.</p>
<p>Notice: <code>wp-cron.php</code> is excluded by default.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:3921:"<h4>2.4.1 (20/07/2021)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Misc: WordPress 5.8 compatibility</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.4.0 (13/05/2021)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Design: add &#8220;Custom CSS&#8221; setting; Finally! 🙂</li>
<li>Design: add &#8220;Footer links&#8221; color setting</li>
<li>Design: add a list of available shortcodes under the &#8220;Text&#8221; editor</li>
<li>Bot: make {visitor_name} placeholder work in all messages after the visitor types his name</li>
<li>Misc: add [embed] shortcode for responsive video embeds; Compatible with YouTube, Vimeo, DailyMotion.</li>
<li>Misc: make the exclude mechanism work with Cyrillic characters</li>
<li>Misc: add <code>wpmm_maintenance_template</code> filter; It works the same way as the <code>wpmm_contact_template</code> filter, but for the maintenance template.</li>
<li>Misc: now you can override the <code>contact</code> email template too; Check <code>/views/contact.php</code> for more details.</li>
<li>Misc: better compatibility with translation plugins like Loco Translate</li>
<li>Misc: the image uploaders (from the dashboard) are now translatable</li>
<li>Misc: improve uninstall routine</li>
<li>Misc: add <code>wpmm_delete_cache</code> action; It is called after each setting change.</li>
<li>Misc: add support for cache plugins like WP Rocket, WP Fastest Cache, Endurance Page Cache, Swift Performance Lite, Cache Enabler, SG Optimizer, LiteSpeed Cache, Nginx Helper;</li>
<li>Misc: remove <code>wpmm_count_where</code> helper function</li>
<li>Misc: code improvements</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.3.0 (07/12/2020)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Modules: add support for Google Analytics 4 measurement ID</li>
<li>Design: enable media buttons on wp_editor (now you can add images from the editor)</li>
<li>Bot: fix translation issue</li>
<li>Misc: add filters for capabilities <code>wpmm_settings_capability</code>, <code>wpmm_subscribers_capability</code>, and <code>wpmm_all_actions_capability</code> (the last one can be used to override all capabilities)</li>
<li>Misc: fix [loginform] shortcode redirect attribute</li>
<li>Misc: a few CSS &amp; Javascript improvements</li>
<li>Misc: bump &#8220;Tested up to&#8221; version to 5.6</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.2.4 (20/05/2019)</h4>
<ul>
<li>bump &#8220;Tested up to&#8221; to 5.2.0</li>
<li>fix typo in Italian translation (it_IT)</li>
<li>Bot: add a note about how you can export the list of subscribers <a href="https://github.com/andrianvaleanu/WP-Maintenance-Mode/issues/195" rel="nofollow ugc">#195</a></li>
<li>Bot: add client-side sanitization to the input fields <a href="https://github.com/andrianvaleanu/WP-Maintenance-Mode/issues/176" rel="nofollow ugc">#176</a></li>
</ul>
<h4>2.2.3 (20/02/2019)</h4>
<ul>
<li>bump &#8220;Tested up to&#8221; version to 5.1.0</li>
<li>replace &#8220;wpmu_new_blog&#8221; action with &#8220;wp_initialize_site&#8221; action for WP 5.1.0 users because the first one is deprecated in the new version</li>
<li>small improvement to &#8220;check_exclude&#8221; method from &#8220;WP_Maintenance_Mode&#8221; class</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.2.2 (27/11/2018)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Google Analytics module: migrate from analytics.js to gtag.js + add ip anonymization <a href="https://github.com/andrianvaleanu/WP-Maintenance-Mode/issues/178" rel="nofollow ugc">#178</a></li>
<li>GDPR module: accept links inside texareas + add policy link target <a href="https://github.com/andrianvaleanu/WP-Maintenance-Mode/issues/188" rel="nofollow ugc">#188</a></li>
<li>add charset meta tag <a href="https://github.com/andrianvaleanu/WP-Maintenance-Mode/issues/200" rel="nofollow ugc">#200</a></li>
<li>fix PHP Notice:  Undefined index: HTTP_USER_AGENT</li>
<li>add plural and single form translation for subscribers number (settings page)</li>
</ul>
<h4>Earlier versions</h4>
<p>For the changelog of earlier versions, please refer to the <a href="https://plugins.svn.wordpress.org/wp-maintenance-mode/trunk/changelog.txt" rel="nofollow ugc">full changelog</a>.</p>

ip";s:5:"2.0.0";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.0.0.zip";s:5:"2.0.1";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.0.1.zip";s:5:"2.0.2";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.0.2.zip";s:5:"2.0.3";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.0.3.zip";s:5:"2.0.4";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.0.4.zip";s:5:"2.0.5";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.0.5.zip";s:5:"2.0.6";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.0.6.zip";s:5:"2.0.7";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.0.7.zip";s:5:"2.0.8";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.0.8.zip";s:5:"2.0.9";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.0.9.zip";s:5:"2.1.0";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.1.0.zip";s:5:"2.1.1";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.1.1.zip";s:5:"2.1.2";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.1.2.zip";s:3:"2.2";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.2.zip";s:5:"2.2.2";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.2.2.zip";s:5:"2.2.3";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.2.3.zip";s:5:"2.2.4";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.2.4.zip";s:5:"2.3.0";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.3.0.zip";s:5:"2.4.0";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.4.0.zip";s:5:"2.4.1";s:68:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.2.4.1.zip";s:5:"trunk";s:62:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wp-maintenance-mode.zip";}s:11:"donate_link";s:0:"";s:5:"icons";a:2:{s:2:"1x";s:72:"https://ps.w.org/wp-maintenance-mode/assets/icon-128x128.png?rev=1746218";s:2:"2x";s:72:"https://ps.w.org/wp-maintenance-mode/assets/icon-256x256.png?rev=1746218";}s:12:"contributors";a:0:{}s:6:"market";N;s:11:"custom_link";N;}s:38:"webappick-product-feed-for-woocommerce";a:28:{s:4:"name";s:51:"CTX Feed &#8211; WooCommerce Product Feed Generator";s:4:"slug";s:38:"webappick-product-feed-for-woocommerce";s:7:"version";s:6:"4.4.43";s:6:"author";s:46:"<a href="https://webappick.com/">WebAppick</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:41:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/wahid0003/";s:8:"requires";s:3:"4.4";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.8.2";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.6";s:6:"rating";i:90;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:269;i:4;i:12;i:3;i:8;i:2;i:11;i:1;i:30;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:330;s:15:"support_threads";i:45;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:28;s:10:"downloaded";i:2142332;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2021-12-19 1:08pm GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2016-02-10";s:8:"homepage";s:22:"https://webappick.com/";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:36391:"<p>Easily create the most optimized and error-free product feeds for your WooCommerce store targeting the leading global and local product marketing channels like Google Shopping or Google Merchant, Facebook Dynamic Product Ads, Instagram Shopping Ads, Pinterest Shopping Ads, TikTok, eBay Ads, Bing Ads, PriceRunner, Rakuten, PriceSpy, Kelko, and more.</p>
<p><strong>WooCommerce Product Feed Pro (CTX Feed)</strong> is a WooCommerce product feed generator plugin for WooCommerce powered stores. This plugin currently supports more than 100+ marketing channels. So, you can target your desired marketing channels, price comparison sites, and/or affiliate networks.</p>
<p>It aims to reduce your hardship on marketing efforts to create product feeds and distribute them in multiple marketing/shopping channels. There are flexible options to update product information according to your given schedule and sync the update to the right channel via HTTP or FTP. Stay at ease knowing that your customers will automatically get the latest product information.</p>
<p><strong>UNLIMITED PRODUCTS</strong></p>
<p>You can create product feed for unlimited products. No matter how many products you have in your WooCommerce Store, this WooCommerce product feed plugin can generate product feed for any number of products.</p>
<p><strong>UNLIMITED FEED</strong></p>
<p>Create unlimited product feeds for multiple channels of your preference. There is no restriction on creating the product feed for the available online channels.</p>
<p><strong>WHAT IS PRODUCT FEED?</strong></p>
<p>The product feed is an XML, TXT, CSV, XLS, or TSV file that contains a list of product information and their attributes (id, title, description, price, image, link, and other attributes) in an organized way so that each product can be displayed into search engines, compared uniquely and can be advertised.</p>
<p><strong>WHY DO I NEED PRODUCT FEED?</strong></p>
<p>You need a product feed if you are a retailer with an eCommerce store and want to get your products into the search engine or price comparison website or affiliate network.  Product feed supply your product information to those online marketing channels so that buyer can easily find your products.</p>
<blockquote>
<h4>Read Step by Step <a href="https://webappick.com/docs/woo-feed/" rel="nofollow ugc">Documentation</a> and <a href="https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLapCcXJAoEenI-35wc6YnnsAAgoYRxDr7" rel="nofollow ugc">Video Tutorial</a></h4>
<p></p>
<h4>For Support Email to <a href="mailto:support@webappick.com" rel="nofollow ugc">support[@]webappick.com</a> </h4>
<p></p>
<h4>REQUEST NEW FEATURE <a href="https://webappick.com/contact/" rel="nofollow ugc">HERE</a></h4>
<p></p>
<h4>PREMIUM VERSION: <a href="https://webappick.com/plugin/woocommerce-product-feed-pro/" rel="nofollow ugc">WOOCOMMERCE PRODUCT FEED PRO</a></h4>
<p>
</p></blockquote>
<p><strong>WHY SHOULD I CHOSE THIS PLUGIN?</strong></p>
<p>In a word, WooCommerce Product Feed is a revolution. Yeah, it&#8217;s a revolution of WooCommerce product feed technology because there are no modules or extensions that generate automatic or manual product feeds that can synchronize flexibility to shopping channels maintained by people with not much technical knowledge about WordPress. Among the thousands of reasons for choosing this WordPress plugin, we have mentioned a few of them below.</p>
<p><strong>Google Merchant Feed Upload</strong><br />
<span class="embed-youtube" style="text-align:center; display: block;"><iframe class="youtube-player" width="640" height="360" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/QRTvrDJm4mI?version=3&#038;rel=1&#038;showsearch=0&#038;showinfo=1&#038;iv_load_policy=1&#038;fs=1&#038;hl=en-US&#038;autohide=2&#038;wmode=transparent" allowfullscreen="true" style="border:0;" sandbox="allow-scripts allow-same-origin allow-popups allow-presentation"></iframe></span></p>
<p><strong>EASY USER INTERFACE:</strong></p>
<p>Creating the product feed and navigating the ctx feed plugin option is easy. Anyone can operate this product feed plugin without having any technical knowledge. You will get all the feed configuration in one window. There is no need to open a separate window to customize any field or option of the plugin.</p>
<p><strong>PRODUCT TYPES:</strong></p>
<p>Supports all default WooCommerce product types including bundle product, composite product, mix &amp; match product, and subscription product by other plugins. Supported product types plugins are below:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/composite-products/" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce Composite Products</a></li>
<li><a href="https://yithemes.com/themes/plugins/yith-woocommerce-composite-products/" rel="nofollow ugc">YITH Composite Products</a></li>
<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wpc-composite-products/">WPC Composite Products for WooCommerce</a></li>
<li><a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/product-bundles/" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce Product Bundles</a></li>
<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/yith-woocommerce-product-bundles/">YITH WooCommerce Product Bundles</a></li>
<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/woo-product-bundle/">WPC Product Bundles for WooCommerce</a></li>
<li><a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/woocommerce-subscriptions/" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce Subscription</a></li>
</ul>
<p><strong>PRODUCT VARIABLE &amp; VARIATION:</strong></p>
<p>The free version of this product feed plugin automatically adds variable products and product variation. If a variable product has four variations, then the plugin will add five products to the product feed, including one product for the variable product (parent of the variations) and four products for variations.</p>
<p>There is an option on the <a href="https://webappick.com/plugin/woocommerce-product-feed-pro/" rel="nofollow ugc">CTX Feed Pro</a> version there you can exclude the variations or the variable products or you can keep both the variable and product variations.</p>
<p><strong>BUILTIN TEMPLATE:</strong></p>
<p>There are more than 100+ pre-configured templates to give you a quick start. Those platform-specific templates will help you create perfect WooCommerce product feeds without wasting valuable time. Apart from saving time, the templates also keep you on the safe side with perfectly formatted product feed templates.</p>
<p><strong>CUSTOM TEMPLATE:</strong></p>
<p>If a template is not available in our plugin, you can use the Custom Template to create any product feed for any channel. We can also add your channel as a template if you send your channels feed requirements to <a href="https://webappick.com/contact/" rel="nofollow ugc">ctx feed support team</a>.</p>
<p><strong>PRODUCT ATTRIBUTES:</strong></p>
<p>You can include all the product attributes available in your product to make a complete product feed. You can make the product feed as detailed as possible.</p>
<p><strong>OUTPUT TYPES:</strong></p>
<p>You can modify or format the output of any product attribute value with these options below:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><strong>Strip tags</strong>: You can remove HTML tags from the product description.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Integer</strong>: You can format a rounded value of any number or product price.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Price</strong>: You can apply a number format to any number or product price.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Rounded Price</strong>: You can apply a round format to any number or product price.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Remove Space</strong>: You can remove double spaces from any attribute value.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Remove Shortcodes</strong>: You can remove shortcodes from the product title, description, or short description, etc.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Remove Special Characters</strong>: Sometimes non-UTF-8 characters are copied when you copy product description from any other source. You can remove these non-UTF-8 characters with this output type.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>CDATA</strong>: CDATA protect any string from conflict between XML element and element value. Adding CDATA is a good practice for XML feed.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>ucfirst</strong>: Make any string’s first character uppercase.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>ucwords</strong>: Uppercase the first character of each word in the string.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>strtoupper</strong>: Transform any string to upper case.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>strtolower</strong>: Transform any string to lower case.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>urlToSecure</strong>: Convert the URL to Secure HTTPS format.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>urlToUnsecure</strong>: Convert the URL to HTTP format.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>only_parent</strong>: Only add a variable product info to variation.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>parent</strong>: Add variable product info to an attribute if variable value is not empty else add variation info.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>parent_if_empty</strong>: Add variable product info to an attribute if the variation info is empty.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Google Date Format</strong>: Format date according to google merchant required format [Date and time, ISO 8601 compliant (YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss, or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ)].</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Total 18 types of output formatting option available</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>PREFIX &amp; SUFFIX:</strong></p>
<p>You can add your preferred prefix and suffix to any product attribute value. For example, if you want to add the currency code with the price, then you can enter the currency code either on prefix or suffix according to your channel requirement.</p>
<p><strong>STATIC VALUE:</strong></p>
<p>You can easily add the same information as a static value to a merchant attribute for all the products. For example, when you add store code to your google local inventory feed, you need to add the same value to your products.</p>
<p><strong>CATEGORY MAPPING:</strong></p>
<p>Categories are the essential key to get products into search results. It is best practice to assign the most matching shopping engine category to your WooCommerce store category for each product. During the creation of your WooCommerce product feeds, you can also create a category for that particular product. And after creating the category, you’ll get an option to map it to your marketplace category so that you can make two categories aligned to each other. This feature is mostly used for Google Shopping feed and Facebook/Instagram product feed. The process is dynamic by our plugin &amp; you can map all of your categories to make them more relevant &amp; reachable to buyers.</p>
<p><strong>BATCH FEED MAKING:</strong></p>
<p>Due to PHP execution time and memory limit, it&#8217;s not possible to process Thousands of products at a time. We have developed the ctx feed plugin with the functionality to make feed with batches. Users can easily set Limit and Offset to make feed. This functionality is compatible with any WordPress Hosting and any number of products you have on your site.</p>
<p><strong>WP OPTIONS:</strong></p>
<p>You will love the ability to include any wp-options values into the Product feed. Your store must have lots of other plugins, and all those WooCommerce plugins save data as an option. We have made it simple to add WP Options value into your WooCommerce product feed.</p>
<p><strong>AUTO FEED UPDATE:</strong></p>
<p>This WooCommerce Date Feed plugin automatically updates the product feed according to your given interval so that your product data will always be up to date —no need to manually update the feed.</p>
<p>Due to product quantity (total products) and server configuration, the auto-feed update may not complete the update operation. For this reason, our plugin processes the products in small batches to make feed for unlimited products. But the auto-update operation process all the products at a time. So it may not work if your site has thousands of products. But you can quickly solve this issue by increasing the PHP execution_time (Time Limit) of your server.</p>
<p><strong>GOOGLE PRODUCT FEED:</strong></p>
<p>WooCommerce. With this woocommerce data feed Plugin, you can create a product feed by selecting the Google product feed template. Our pre-built google product feed template includes all the fields (Brand, GTIN, MPN, Product condition, etc.) that match the Google Product Feed requirements.</p>
<p>According to your feed configuration, this woocommerce data feed plugin automatically identifies the value for identifier_exist attribute based on Brand, GTIN, and MPN value.</p>
<p>Google Shopping product feed template automatically formats all the google product feed attribute structure according to <a href="https://support.google.com/merchants/answer/7052112?hl=en" rel="nofollow ugc">Google Product Feed</a> requirements.</p>
<p><strong>GOOGLE CANONICAL URL:</strong></p>
<p>When you sell your woocommerce product with a different color variant, you may use the canonical_link attribute to submit the URL for each variant.</p>
<p>Then comes the canonical_link attribute that redirects all the variants to the main product&#8217;s landing page that does not include any variant. Google&#8217;s web search crawler identifies the URLs that link to a single base product that does not have any pre-selected parameters.</p>
<p><strong>GOOGLE SHIPPING &amp; TAX:</strong></p>
<p>CTX Feed plugin allows you to place the shipping zone and shipping class accurately so that your Google Shopping product feed includes the correct shipping information (shipping country, region, service, postal_code, price). Our plugin utilizes your configured shipping zone settings for a proper representation. Along with WooCommerce Shipping this WooCommerce Google Product Feed plugin also compatible with <a href="https://codecanyon.net/item/table-rate-shipping-for-woocommerce/3796656" rel="nofollow ugc">Table Rate Shipping</a> plugin by BolderElement.</p>
<p><strong>GOOGLE ANALYTICS UTM PARAMETER:</strong></p>
<p>WooCommerce Product Feed plugin has an option to include Google Analytics UTM parameters to the product URLs that will help you evaluate your marketing channels&#8217; performance via Google Analytics.</p>
<p><strong>GOOGLE DYNAMIC REMARKETING:</strong></p>
<p>Google Dynamic remarketing event snippet collects data about specific searches related to a product and represents personalized ads by matching them with your product feed.</p>
<p>Our plugin allows you to add Google Dynamic Remarketing event snippets across different pages of your website and enable the basic remarketing features of Google Remarketing Tracking.</p>
<p><strong>TABLE RATE SHIPPING:</strong></p>
<p>This plugin supports the WooCommerce Table Rate shipping by bolder element.</p>
<p><strong>FACEBOOK CATALOG / INSTAGRAM SHOPPING FEED:</strong></p>
<p>Facebook Catalog and Instagram have their own set of requirements that you need to follow to make a Facebook product feed or Instagram Shop feed. The attributes included in WooCommerce is not enough for Facebook Product Feed and Instagram Shop Feed.</p>
<p>With our Plugin, you can easily create a product feed by selecting the Facebook Catalog / Instagram template. We have included a pre-built Facebook Catalog Feed / Instagram Shop Feed template that includes all the required Facebook and Instagram attributes.</p>
<p><strong>FACEBOOK PIXEL TRACKING:</strong></p>
<p>With this plugin, you can integrate Facebook pixel code on your website and match it with the Facebook catalog/ Instagram product feed contents.</p>
<p>You can add Facebook Pixel events for Product pages, simple product page, variable product page, both Simple and Variable page, Category pages, Search result pages, All AddToCart events (cart page, cart button), Thank you Page</p>
<p><strong>PINTEREST SHOPPING PRODUCT FEED:</strong></p>
<p>With the Pinterest Product Feed template, you can easily create a product feed for woocommerce. We have included a pre-built Pinterest Feed template that includes all the Pinterest product feed attributes.</p>
<p><strong>BING SHOPPING PRODUCT FEED:</strong></p>
<p>With this plugin, you can create a Bing Shopping product feed by selecting the pre-made Bing Shopping Feed template. The Bing Shopping template includes all the necessary attributes that are required by Bing Shopping.</p>
<p><strong>DYNAMIC DISCOUNT &amp; PRICING</strong></p>
<p>Our plugin automatically discounted price applied by any Dynamic Discount &amp; Pricing Plugin.</p>
<p><strong>SEO TITLE &amp; META DESCRIPTION</strong></p>
<p>CTX Feed plugin is compatible with three top-rated / most popular SEO plugins. You can assign SEO Meta Title and Meta Description instead of Product Title and Description if you want. Supported plugins are:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wordpress-seo/">Yoast SEO</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/all-in-one-seo-pack/">All in one SEO</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/seo-by-rank-math/">Rank Math SEO</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>BUILTIN PLUGIN CACHE</strong></p>
<p>The built-in caching feature of our WooCommerce product feed plugin reduces the server load so that you can generate a product feed without requesting multiple database queries.</p>
<blockquote>
<h4>If you like Free Version, you&#8217;ll love the Pro Version</h4>
<p></p>
<h4><a href="http://webappick.com/plugin/woocommerce-product-feed-pro/" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce Product Feed Pro</a> gives you everything you&#8217;ll find in free and some awesome features described below.</h4>
</blockquote>
<p><strong>PRODUCT BRAND (PRO FEATURE)</strong></p>
<p>CTX Feed Pro plugin has an option to add product brands. You can even add other brand plugins data for brands of your preference. The supported brand plugins are listed below:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://woocommerce.com/products/brands/" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce Brands</a></li>
<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/perfect-woocommerce-brands/">Perfect Brands for WooCommerce</a></li>
<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/yith-woocommerce-brands-add-on/">YITH WooCommerce Brands Add-On</a></li>
<li><a href="https://codecanyon.net/item/ultimate-woocommerce-brands-plugin/9433984" rel="nofollow ugc">Ultimate WooCommerce Brands Plugin</a></li>
</ul>
<p><strong>DYNAMIC ATTRIBUTE (PRO FEATURE)</strong></p>
<p>The Dynamic Attribute combines the powerful features of the WooCommerce Product Feed Pro with the ability to set your conditions for any attribute. Different types of WooCommerce users have different types &amp; classes of products and services. So, they may need a variety of custom values to demonstrate their products. And we are giving the options to make dynamic attributes as your need. It is also possible to generate the data feed file according to the search engine&#8217;s requirements without changing your store&#8217;s attributes.</p>
<p><strong>SMART FILTER &amp; CONDITION (PRO FEATURE)</strong></p>
<p>Smart Filters help you exclude the non-profitable or out of season products you don’t want to share. Its high filtering options help users filter products according to product titles, price, availability of stocks, user rating, and other extensive product specifications.</p>
<p><strong>ATTRIBUTE MAPPING (PRO FEATURE)</strong></p>
<p>The first impression becomes the last impression! For example, Your product title can build interest in the buyer to hit your product. In the e-commerce business, product titles attract customers to get on the link if they are satisfied with the search result. The extended Product Title feature allows the user to extend the title of a product by adding different attributes. Extended Product Title is a great way to differentiate the products according to their variations, such as Size, Color, Custom Text, etc.</p>
<p><strong>MULTI LANGUAGE FEED &#8211; WPML &amp; POLYLANG (PRO FEATURE)</strong></p>
<p>WooCommerce Product Feed Pro is compatible with <a href="https://wpml.org/" rel="nofollow ugc">WPML</a> &amp; <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/polylang/">Polylang</a> plugin for Multi-Language Feed. And by supporting WPML &amp; Polylang makes it possible for the woocommerce store owners to create woocommerce product feed in different languages &amp; currencies.</p>
<p>Multilanguage enables retailers to globalize their business in minutes because they always have a better chance of selling something if they are already selling it in the native language.</p>
<p><strong>MULTI CURRENCY FEED (PRO FEATURE)</strong></p>
<p>When you want to globalize the business by selling your products in different local channels of different countries, you can create the product feed with the currency according to that channel’s currency requirement.</p>
<p>WooCommerce Product Feed Pro can create product feeds for specific currencies.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/woocommerce-multilingual/">WooCommerce Multilingual</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://polylang.pro/downloads/polylang-for-woocommerce/" rel="nofollow ugc">Polylang WooCommerce</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://aelia.co/shop/currency-switcher-woocommerce/" rel="nofollow ugc">Currency Switcher for WooCommerce</a> By Aelia.</li>
<li><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/woocommerce-currency-switcher/">WooCommerce Currency Switcher (WOOCS)</a> by realmag777.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>MULTI VENDOR FEED (PRO FEATURE)</strong></p>
<p>Generating product feeds for your multi-vendor enabled WooCommerce store is also straightforward. You can choose multiple vendors or a single vendor while creating product feeds. The list of supported multi-vendor plugins is below.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://wedevs.com/dokan" rel="nofollow ugc">Dokan</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://www.wcvendors.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">WC Vendors</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://wc-marketplace.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">WC Marketplace</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://yithemes.com/themes/plugins/yith-woocommerce-multi-vendor/" rel="nofollow ugc">YITH WooCommerce Multi-Vendor</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://wclovers.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">WCFM Marketplace for WooCommerce</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>CUSTOM ATTRIBUTE (PRO FEATURE)</strong></p>
<p>If you have added any custom attribute field to your product, you will get the product attribute list fields while creating a feed to assign your product&#8217;s custom field value to your channel attribute.</p>
<p><strong>CUSTOM  FIELDS &#8211; ACF,FIELD FACTORY,ETC. (PRO FEATURE)</strong></p>
<p>This plugin supports the <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/advanced-custom-fields/">Advanced Custom Field (ACF)</a> or any custom field plugin’s fields as attribute values. You can assign your custom product attribute values to any feed attribute.</p>
<p><strong>PRODUCT META &amp; TAXONOMIES (PRO FEATURE)</strong></p>
<p>Product meta and taxonomies are very common, but what if you wanted to add them with your product feeds too? You can add any product taxonomies or any product meta value added by WooCommerce or any WooCommerce extension plugins into your product feeds with our support for the custom taxonomies and meta. Easily add product information like brand name, model number, and size.</p>
<p><strong>AVAILABLE FEATURES:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Unlimited number of products.</li>
<li>Unlimited number of feeds.</li>
<li>It is highly customizable, having access to 100+ merchant sites &amp; also very responsive of user commands.</li>
<li>100+ Pre configured merchant template for 200+ countries.</li>
<li>Feeds are accessible via HTTP or HTTPS. So that merchant can easily and automatically fetch product feed from given Feed URL.</li>
<li>You can post your product feeds either manually from your site to shopping engines<br />
or you can also set FTP to post your feeds automatically to your desired engines.</li>
<li>There are 3 supported file formats for feeds. XML, TXT, CSV.</li>
<li>Attribute Prefix and Suffix. You can easily add Marketing or Promo Text with Product Title, Description And its also possible to add Price symbol,currency code with price.</li>
<li>Output formatting using Strip Tags, UTF-8 encode, Remove Space, CDATA, Htmlentities, Price and Number format.</li>
<li>Output Limitation. You can Limit output length according to your merchant feed specification.</li>
<li>Scheduled Feed Update</li>
<li>Auto Feed upload via FTP</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.google.com/retail/merchant-center/" rel="nofollow ugc">Google Shopping</a></li>

<p><strong>CUSTOMER SUPPORT TEAM</strong></p>
<p>We’ve a dedicated team of coders and wordpress experts to make your journey to us friendlier &amp; error free. So, if you want to use our plugin or if you are facing any problem with our plugin feel free to say us by emailing here: support@webappick.com.</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:749:"<p>Before installing the plugin please make sure that</p>
<ol>
<li>Your php version is 5.4 or greater</li>
<li>WordPress version is 3.6 or greater</li>
<li>WooCommerce version is 2.4 or greater</li>
</ol>
<p>You can also check your system status and versions from WooCommerce &gt; System Status</p>
<p>This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.</p>
<p>e.g.</p>
<ol>
<li>Upload <code>webappick-product-feed-for-woocommerce</code> folder to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory</li>
<li>Activate the plugin through the &#8216;Plugins&#8217; menu in WordPress</li>
<li>Select &#8216;CTX Feed&#8217; from admin menu, Click &#8216;Make Feed&#8217;</li>
<li>Select the template and make feed</li>
<li>Done!</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:1493:"<blockquote>
<h4>Read <a href="https://webappick.com/docs/woo-feed/" rel="nofollow ugc">Documentation and FAQ</a></h4>
<p></p>
<h4>For Support Email to support@webappick.com</h4>
<p>
</p></blockquote>

<dt id='which%20shopping%20engines%20are%20supported%3F'>
which shopping engines are supported?
</h4>
<p>
<p>This plugin support all the sopping engines.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20the%20plugin%20support%20product%20variation%3F'>
Does the plugin support product variation?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes</p>
</p>
<dt id='is%20there%20any%20limitation%20to%20feed%20size%3F'>
Is there any limitation to feed size?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No, You can make unlimited number of feed</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20is%20the%20difference%20between%20free%20and%20pro%20version%3F'>
What is the difference between Free and Pro Version?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Free version include all the major functions but Pro version have some awesome functionality.</p>
<p>Using pro version:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>You can filter product using price, quantity, product name</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>You can use custom taxonomies or other plugins taxonomy value into feed</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Using Category Mapping You can map your store category with your merchant category which is very useful for visitor to find out your product into merchant site.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>You can make different price for different merchant using Dynamic Attribute. Also it is possible to set different value for different product using Dynamic Attribute Conditions.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:62970:"<h4>4.4.43 (2021-12-19)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: Woocommerce 6.0.0 version compatability added.</li>
<li>Fixed: Prevent unnecessary aramex shipping plugin files from loading.</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.4.42 (2021-12-13)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: New added attribute does not work after dragging to new position &#8211; issue has been fixed.</li>
<li>Fixed: Woocommerce override schema data issue fixed.</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.4.41 (2021-12-06)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: Miinto.de template updated.</li>
<li>Fixed: Banner collapsed when woocommerce is not installed &#8211; issue has been fixed.</li>
<li>Fixed: Attributes min_handling_time and max_handling_time does not output attribute value &#8211; issue has been fixed.</li>
<li>Fixed: Undefined array_column for product type error &#8211; issue has been fixed.</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.4.40 (2021-12-01)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Updated: Heureka.sk template updated.</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.4.39 (2021-11-26)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Updated: Facebook new attribute added.</li>
<li>Added: Currency attribute has been added.</li>
<li>Fixed: Price suffix changing issue has been solved.</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.4.38 (2021-11-19)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Loyalty point attribute for Google shopping template not working issue fixed.</li>
<li>Fixed: Product sale price override in schema issue fixed.</li>
<li>Fixed: Conflict with woo discount plugin and sale price attribute issue fixed.</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.4.37 (2021-11-16)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Currency/Unit postfix customization issue fix.</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.4.36 (2021-11-10)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Item Wrapper and Single Item Wrapper fields should be hide when the template is not custom template.</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.4.35 (2021-11-09)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Variable product missing issue fixed.</li>
<li>Tweak: WooCommerce 5.9.0 compatability tested.</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.4.34 (2021-11-02)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: Google Remarketing Tag tracking support added.</li>
<li>Added: Quantity sell attribute added for facebook.</li>
<li>Fixed: Product category sequence issue fixed.</li>
<li>Fixed: Skroutz.gr availability string issue fixed.</li>
<li>Fixed: Tab display conflict with 3rd party plugin issue fixed.</li>
<li>Fixed: Group product price issue fixed.</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.4.33 (2021-10-22)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Unit &amp; Currency postfix issue.</li>
</ul>
<h4>4.4.32 (2021-10-21)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Added: Unit &amp; Currency auto postfix added.</li>
<li>Fixed: Design issue fixed.</li>
<li>Fixed: Automated output type select issue fixed.</li>
<li>Modified: Category full path output type modified.</li>
</ul>

<h4>3.1.46 (2019-11-06)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fix &#8216;No Products found&#8217; while using &#8216;Custom Template 2 (XML)&#8217;</li>
<li>Tested Up to WC 3.8</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.1.45 (2019-11-03)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Loading ClipboardJS directly from plugin for older WordPress</li>
<li>Added WooCommerce minimum version checking before loading other dependencies</li>
<li>Fix support for WooCommerce older than 3.6.0</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.1.44 (2019-10-31)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Remove Duplicate Css</li>
<li>Fix success message not showing</li>
<li>Fix PHP non-numeric value &amp; counting null warning</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.1.43 (2019-10-27)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Improve Page loading performance on feed editor</li>
<li>FTP Module detection added in <code>FTP/SFTP</code> tab in feed editor</li>
<li>Fix 3rd Party Plugin Compatibility</li>
</ul>
<h4>3.1.42 (2019-10-27)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fix deactivation script</li>
</ul>

<li>Added the functionality to make feed for External/Affiliate Product</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.0.12(2017-03-27)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Removed default space from after suffix and before prefix.</li>
<li>Fixed the number_format command issue and documentation updated.</li>
<li>Fixed last version errors.</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.0.11(2017-03-20)</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed the zero output error</li>

clear message that the site uses cookies.<br />
This plugin supports multi-language installations with the polylang-plugin from Chouby or WPML-plugin from wpml.org. It has a wide array of settings for controlling the style and contents.<br />
WF Cookie Consent is the &#8220;wunderfarm-way&#8221; to show how your website complies with the EU Cookie Law.</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:279:"<ol>
<li>Upload <code>WF Cookie Consent</code> to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory</li>
<li>Activate the plugin through the &#8216;Plugins&#8217; menu in WordPress</li>
<li>If you want to set custom settings, go to Settings menu &gt; WF Cookie Consent.</li>
</ol>
";s:9:"changelog";s:1884:"<h4>1.1.4</h4>
<p>Important fix for a XSS vulnerability on the &#8216;Settings-Page&#8217;.</p>
<h4>1.1.3</h4>
<p>Improved performance by loading a minified js file. Added rel=&#8221;noopener&#8221; to the link referring to the policy page.</p>
<h4>1.1.2</h4>
<p>Added a direct link to generate a cookie policy.</p>
<h4>1.1.1</h4>
<p>Added Hungarian Language. Minor Bugfixes.</p>
<h4>1.1.0</h4>
<p>Better admin default options, performance improvements and iubenda integration added.</p>
<h4>1.0.1</h4>
<p>Bugfix: Unescaped HTML in text output</p>
<h4>1.0.0</h4>
<p>Improved performance by loading WF Cookie Consent later</p>
<h4>0.9.9</h4>
<p>Compatibility for Polylang Version 1.8</p>
<h4>0.9.8</h4>
<p>Compatibility for WPML Version 3.2 and above</p>
<h4>0.9.7</h4>
<p>Improved compatibility with WPML Multilingual CMS 3.2.6</p>
<h4>0.9.5</h4>
<p>Compatibility for IE8 and previous IE versions</p>
<h4>0.9.4</h4>
<p>Bugfix: The page-selector is now showing all entries.</p>
<h4>0.9.3</h4>
<p>Updated Readme and Upgrade Notice.</p>
<h4>0.9.2</h4>
<p>Bugfix: Compatibility with Polylang and WPML.</p>
<h4>0.9.1</h4>
<p>Improved compatibility with Polylang and WPML.</p>
<h4>0.9.0</h4>
<p>Bugfix: For websites using earlier versions of WPML.</p>
<h4>0.8.9</h4>
<p>Bugfix: Include js file.</p>
<h4>0.8.8</h4>
<p>Bugfix: Improved wf_get_languages().</p>
<h4>0.8.7</h4>
<p>Improved compatibility with other plugins and themes.</p>
<h4>0.8.6</h4>
<p>Bugfix: Set cookie path (thx for the bug report adfasyxcv!)</p>
<h4>0.8.5</h4>
<p>Improved compatibility with other plugins.</p>
<h4>0.8.4</h4>
<p>Escaped text strings for echoing in JS &amp; option field descriptions.</p>
<h4>0.8.3</h4>
<p>Bugfix: Custom settings with Polylang.</p>
<h4>0.8.2</h4>
<p>Bugfixes: Custom fields for default language (en) and selected more-info page.</p>
<h4>0.8.1</h4>
<p>Support for WPML and Polylang.</p>
