law";s:9:"cookiebar";s:9:"cookiebar";s:9:"cookielaw";s:9:"cookielaw";s:7:"cookies";s:7:"cookies";}s:8:"versions";a:26:{s:5:"0.8.1";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.8.1.zip";s:5:"0.8.2";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.8.2.zip";s:5:"0.8.3";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.8.3.zip";s:5:"0.8.4";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.8.4.zip";s:5:"0.8.5";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.8.5.zip";s:5:"0.8.6";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.8.6.zip";s:5:"0.8.7";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.8.7.zip";s:5:"0.8.8";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.8.8.zip";s:5:"0.8.9";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.8.9.zip";s:5:"0.9.0";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.9.0.zip";s:5:"0.9.1";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.9.1.zip";s:5:"0.9.2";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.9.2.zip";s:5:"0.9.3";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.9.3.zip";s:5:"0.9.4";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.9.4.zip";s:5:"0.9.5";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.9.5.zip";s:5:"0.9.7";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.9.7.zip";s:5:"0.9.8";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.9.8.zip";s:5:"0.9.9";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.0.9.9.zip";s:5:"1.0.0";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.1.0.0.zip";s:5:"1.0.1";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.1.0.1.zip";s:5:"1.1.0";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.1.1.0.zip";s:5:"1.1.1";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.1.1.1.zip";s:5:"1.1.2";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.1.1.2.zip";s:5:"1.1.3";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.1.1.3.zip";s:5:"1.1.4";s:66:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.1.1.4.zip";s:5:"trunk";s:60:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/wf-cookie-consent.zip";}s:11:"donate_link";s:26:"https://www.wunderfarm.com";s:5:"icons";a:2:{s:2:"1x";s:70:"https://ps.w.org/wf-cookie-consent/assets/icon-128x128.png?rev=1330603";s:2:"2x";s:70:"https://ps.w.org/wf-cookie-consent/assets/icon-256x256.png?rev=1330603";}s:12:"contributors";a:0:{}s:6:"market";N;s:11:"custom_link";N;}s:28:"woocommerce-novalnet-gateway";a:28:{s:4:"name";s:46:"WooCommerce payment plugin &#8211; Novalnet AG";s:4:"slug";s:28:"woocommerce-novalnet-gateway";s:7:"version";s:7:"12.0.10";s:6:"author";s:49:"<a href="https://www.novalnet.de">Novalnet AG</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:40:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/novalnet/";s:8:"requires";s:3:"4.0";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.8.2";s:12:"requires_php";b:0;s:6:"rating";i:86;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:3;i:4;i:0;i:3;i:0;i:2;i:1;i:1;i:0;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:4;s:15:"support_threads";i:1;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:1;s:10:"downloaded";i:40907;s:12:"last_updated";s:22:"2021-12-10 11:33am GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2013-05-13";s:8:"homepage";s:41:"https://www.novalnet.de/modul/woocommerce";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:19082:"<h4>(German)</h4>
<p>(English Description down below)</p>
<p>Das Novalnet Payment-Plugin für Woocommerce bietet Ihnen eine Vielzahl an hilfreichen Features, die das tägliche Arbeiten mit dem Woocommerce-Shopsystem vereinfachen.</p>
<p>Wählen Sie aus den weltweit beliebtesten über 100 lokalen und internationalen Zahlungsmethoden die für Sie passenden aus, vom Rechnungskauf über SEPA-Lastschrift bis hin zur Kreditkarte.</p>
<p>Kreditkartenzahlungen sind zusätzlich durch das 3D-Secure-Verfahren abgesichert, um Ihnen als Shop-Betreiber noch mehr Sicherheit zu bieten. Damit gehört das Plugin der Novalnet AG zu einem der populärsten Extensions im Bereich Payment.</p>
<p>Das Plugin automatisiert den gesamten Transaktionsvorgang vom Checkout bis zum Forderungsmanagement und Inkasso. Darüber hinaus sichert es die Transaktionen ab und hilft Ihnen als Unternehmen dabei, Ihren Umsatz durch die folgenden Vorteile langfristig zu steigern:</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.novalnet.de/zahlungsabwicklung/" title="über 100 lokal und international nachgefragte Zahlungsarten" rel="nofollow ugc">über 100 lokal und international nachgefragte Zahlungsarten</a> bereits integriert</li>
<li>umfangreiches <a href="https://www.novalnet.de/risikomanagement/" title="Risikomanagement" rel="nofollow ugc">Risikomanagement</a> zur Minimierung von Zahlungsausfällen durch mehr als 60 im Hintergrund arbeitende Betrugspräventionsmodule</li>
<li>Für Zahlungsausfälle frei einstellbares, optional kostenloses Forderungsmanagement inkl. verschiedener Mahnstufen</li>
<li>Automatisierte Rechnungsstellung für Ihre Endkunden</li>
<li>umfangreiches und kostenloses Debitorenmanagement mit diversen Exportmöglichkeiten für Buchhaltungsprogramme </li>
<li>Realtime-Monitoring, das Ihren Checkoutprozess in Bezug auf Kaufabbrüche überwacht, und Reporting </li>
<li>Ihre Gelder sind durch Treuhandkonten zu 100 % u.a. vor einer Insolvenz geschützt</li>
<li>Kostenfreier technischer Support bei Einbindung und Betrieb des Zahlungs-Plugins</li>
<li>Attraktive und flexible Auszahlungsmodalitäten</li>
<li>Optionale Mitgliederverwaltung</li>
<li>Spezielles Endkundenportal für Rückfragen zur Transaktion</li>
</ul>
<p>Einfache SEPA-Lastschrift-Lösung. Sie müssen kein separates Bankkonto eröffnen</p>
<h4>VERMEIDEN SIE MEHRERE VERTRÄGE UND VERSTECKTE KOSTEN</h4>
<p>Mehrere Verträge für die Zahlungsabwicklung mit verschiedenen Dienstleistern wie Banken, Kreditkarten-Acquirern, Anbietern von Betrugspräventionen, Inkassounternehmen etc. und mit unterschiedlichen Laufzeiten und Gebühren sind mit Nutzung des Plugins Vergangenheit.</p>
<p>Die Novalnet-Plattform sorgt dafür, dass Ihre Zahlungen in WooCommerce reibungslos abgewickelt werden, erstellt automatisch Ihre Rechnungen, verschickt pünktlich Mahnungen und verarbeitet auch On-hold-Transaktionen und wiederkehrende Zahlungen.</p>
<p>Ihre über WooCommerce generierten Transaktionen sind durch ein Höchstmaß an Sicherheit geschützt. Dazu wird die Novalnet AG jedes Jahr in einem umfangreichen Sicherheits-Audit nach dem Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) auf dem höchsten Level 1 geprüft und zertifiziert.</p>
<p>Die vielfach automatisierten Abläufe sorgen dafür, dass Sie Kosten sparen und sich auf Ihren Verkaufserfolg konzentrieren können.</p>
<h4>WICHTIGSTE FUNKTIONEN</h4>
<ul>
<li>Einfache Integration in Ihren Bestellprozess – es wird keine externe Seite für die Zahlung aufgerufen</li>
<li>Responsive Zahlungsseiten</li>
<li>Sichere SSL-verschlüsselte Gateways</li>
<li>Klare Echtzeit-Übersicht und Überwachung des Zahlungsstatus sowie automatisierte E-Mail-Benachrichtigungsfunktion für Zahlungsstatusreports</li>
<li>Automatisierte Berichte und verschiedene Exportfunktionen für Ihre Buchhaltung in XML, SOAP, CSV, MT940 u.v.m. </li>
<li>Kreditkartenzahlungen <a href="https:4.0.0//www.novalnet.de/service/3d-secure-infos/" title="mit 3D-Secure" rel="nofollow ugc">mit 3D-Secure</a></li>
<li><a href="https://www.novalnet.de/pci-dss-zertifizierung/" title="PCI-DSS-konform" rel="nofollow ugc">PCI-DSS-konform</a>, keine aufwändige und teure Zertifizierung notwendig</li>
</ul>
<h4>MIT DEM PLUGIN KÖNNEN SIE VIELES DIREKT ÜBER DIE WOOCOMMERCE-EINSTELLUNGEN VERWALTEN</h4>
<ul>
<li>Einfache Konfigurationsmöglichkeit für alle Zahlungsarten</li>
<li>Einfache Möglichkeit zum Bestätigen und Stornieren von On-Hold-Transaktionen</li>
<li>Einfaches Durchführen von Rückerstattungen aus der Shop-Administration heraus</li>
<li>Flexible <a href="https://www.novalnet.de/abonnementverwaltung/" title="Abonnementverwaltung" rel="nofollow ugc">Abonnementverwaltung</a> für wiederkehrende Zahlungen</li>
<li>Flexibles Affiliate-Management für Partnerprogramm-Betreiber</li>
<li>Sehr einfaches Konfigurieren des Risikomanagements</li>
<li>Einstellen komfortabler Statusmeldungen, z.B. für Zahlungseingänge bei Kauf auf Rechnung und Vorkasse</li>
<li>Bequeme E-Mail-Benachrichtigungsfunktion über Statusmeldungen der Zahlungen</li>
<li>Übersichtliches Status-Management für Chargebacks sowie SEPA-Rücklastschriften</li>
<li>Vorhalten von Bestelldaten bei Kaufabbrüchen</li>
</ul>
<h4>LASSEN SIE IHRE KUNDEN ZAHLEN, WIE SIE MÖCHTEN</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.novalnet.de/zahlungsart-kreditkarte/" title="Kreditkarte" rel="nofollow ugc">Kreditkarte</a>: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, JCB, UnionPay, Diners Club, Discover</li>
<li>Debitkarte: Maestro, Carte Bleue, CartaSi, Postepay, PostFinance, dankort</li>
<li>Online-Überweisung: Sofortüberweisung, eps, iDEAL, giropay, Przelewy24 etc.</li>
<li>Wallet: PayPal.</li>
<li>Vorkasse, Rechnung, Kauf auf Rechnung mit Zahlungsgarantie</li>
<li><a href="https://www.novalnet.de/sepa-lastschrift/" title="SEPA-Lastschrift" rel="nofollow ugc">SEPA-Lastschrift</a>, Direct Debit UK (BACS)</li>
<li>Barzahlen/viacash</li>
<li>Ratenzahlung</li>
<li>Direct Carrier Billing (Zahlen per Handyrechnung)</li>
<li>Kauf auf  Rechnung und <a href="https://www.novalnet.de/lastschrift-mit-zahlungsgarantie/" title="SEPA-Lastschrift sind auch mit Zahlungsgarantie" rel="nofollow ugc">SEPA-Lastschrift sind auch mit Zahlungsgarantie</a> möglich.</li>
</ul>
<h4>GEHEN SIE AUF NUMMER SICHER</h4>
<p>Die intelligente Novalnet-Betrugsprävention ist abhängig von Zahlungsart, Produktpalette und Warenkorbgröße. Durch zahlreiche, unabhängig zuschaltbare Fraudmodule verringert sich Ihre Zahlungsausfallquote spürbar.</p>
<h4>SIE HABEN FRAGEN?</h4>
<p>Kontaktieren Sie uns per E-Mail an <a href="mailto:&#115;&#097;&#x6c;&#x65;&#x73;&#x40;&#x6e;&#111;&#118;&#097;&#108;&#110;&#x65;&#x74;&#x2e;&#x64;&#x65;&#047;" title="sales@novalnet.de" rel="nofollow ugc">sales@novalnet.de</a> oder telefonisch unter +49 89 9230683-20.</p>
<p>Weitere Informationen über Novalnet und zur Kompatibilität des Novalnet-Payment-Plugins finden Sie weiter unten.</p>
<h4>(English)</h4>
<h4>ACCEPT, MANAGE &amp; COLLECT PAYMENTS &#8211; WOOCOMMERCE</h4>
<p>The WooCommerce Payment Plugin from Novalnet allows you to accept, manage and collect payments. It is designed to optimize your payment processing, enrich customer experiences and improve conversion rates.<br />
Hundreds of e-commerce businesses across the world use this plugin to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Accept 100+ international &amp; local payment methods</li>
<li>Add new payment methods any time</li>
<li>Manage payments, subscriptions &amp; members </li>
<li>Secure transactions with proven risk management</li>
<li>Avoid own <a href="https://www.novalnet.com/pci-dss-certification/" title="PCI DSS certification" rel="nofollow ugc">PCI DSS certification</a> </li>
<li>Automate customer communication related to payments</li>
<li>Provide payment support for end customers</li>
<li>Follow transactions in real time</li>
<li>Automate reporting for bookkeeping &amp; other departments etc.</li>
</ul>
<h4>WIDE PAYMENT PORTFOLIO FOR YOUR ONLINE SHOP</h4>
<p>The WooCommerce Novalnet Payment Plugin enables access to <a href="https://www.novalnet.com/payment/" title="international and local payment methods" rel="nofollow ugc">international and local payment methods</a> that can be easily integrated to your checkout process already today. Your payment portfolio remains up to date and follows both global and local payment trends across the world.</p>
<p>Novalnet’s WooCommerce Payment Plugin supports:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><a href="https://www.novalnet.com/credit-card/" title="Credit cards" rel="nofollow ugc">Credit cards</a> (3DSecure also available): Visa, Mastercard, American Express, JCB, UnionPay, Diners Club,  Discover etc.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Debit cards: Maestro, Visa, Carte Bleue, CartaSi, Postepay, PostFinance, dankort etc.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Online bank transfers: Sofort, eps, iDEAL, giropay, Przelewy24, PostFinance Card, PostFinance E-Finance, Bancontact etc.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>E-wallets:  <a href="https://www.novalnet.com/paypal/" title="PayPal" rel="nofollow ugc">PayPal</a> etc.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Prepayment, Invoice, <a href="https://www.novalnet.com/sepa-direct-debit/" title="Direct Debit SEPA" rel="nofollow ugc">Direct Debit SEPA</a>, <a href="https://www.novalnet.com/barzahlen/" title="Barzahlen" rel="nofollow ugc">Barzahlen/viacash</a> &amp; Multibanco.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee, Invoice with payment guarantee, Instalment by Invoice &amp; Instalment by Direct Debit SEPA</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>More information about each payment method can be found on our <a href="https://www.novalnet.de/zahlungsabwicklung/" title="website" rel="nofollow ugc">website</a>. If you have any additional inquiries, please do not hesitate to contact us at <a href="mailto:&#115;&#097;&#x6c;&#x65;&#x73;&#x40;&#x6e;&#111;&#118;&#097;&#108;&#110;&#x65;&#x74;&#x2e;&#x64;&#x65;&#047;" title="sales@novalnet.de" rel="nofollow ugc">sales@novalnet.de</a> or +49 89 9230683-20.</p>
<h4>ADVANCED PAYMENT EXPERIENCES FOR YOUR CUSTOMERS</h4>
<p>Novalnet Payment Gateway for WooCommerce ensures that your WooCommerce offers seamless payment experiences. It provides optimized customer communications and auto-fill of payment details for future purchases. Set up email notifications and reminders for payment status updates and offer valuable customer support through Novalnet platform.</p>
<h4>DIGITALIZATION &amp; REAL-TIME MONITORING</h4>
<p>Novalnet’s WooCommerce Payment Plugin integrates your shop with one payment platform that covers all payment methods and services at once. Save costs, manual effort and time with the following WooCommerce Payment Plugin features.</p>
<h4>KEY FEATURES</h4>
<ul>
<li>Easy configuration of all international &amp; local payment methods</li>
<li>Unified monitoring, reporting, and payouts for all payment methods</li>
<li>Easy to install &amp; configure without technical understanding</li>
<li>Plug &amp; Play &#8211; no extra plugins/scripts needed to process transactions </li>
<li>No PCI DSS certification required when using our payment module</li>
<li>60+ risk &amp; payment fraud detection modules to prevent defaults in real time</li>
<li>Secure SSL- encoded gateways</li>
<li>One-click shopping supported for Credit/Debit Cards, Direct Debit SEPA, Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee, Instalment by Direct Debit SEPA &amp; PayPal </li>
<li>Custom CSS configuration for Credit/Debit Card iframe</li>
<li>Automated invoice generation</li>
<li>Easy confirmation/cancellation of on-hold transactions for Direct Debit SEPA, Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee, Instalment payment for Direct Debit SEPA, Credit/Debit Card, Invoice, Invoice with payment guarantee, Instalment payment for Invoice, Prepayment &amp; PayPal</li>
<li>Refund option for Credit/Debit Cards, Direct Debit SEPA, Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee, Instalment by Direct Debit SEPA, Invoice, Invoice with payment guarantee, Instalment by Invoice, Prepayment, Barzahlen/viacash, Sofort, iDEAL, eps, giropay, PayPal, Przelewy24, PostFinance Card, PostFinance E-Finance &amp; Bancontact</li>
<li>Automated e-mail notifications for staying up to date on the payment status</li>
<li>Clear overview of payment status from checkout to receivables</li>
<li>Secure end customer portal for payment inquiries </li>
<li>Fully-automated debt collection</li>
<li>Multilevel claims management with integrated handover to collection and various export functions for the accounting</li>
<li>Affiliate solution supporting frictionless onboarding, split payments &amp; currency conversion </li>
<li>Automated bookkeeping report in XML, SOAP, CSV, MT940</li>
<li>Free technical support upon integration</li>
<li>Dynamic subscription and member management for recurring payments</li>
<li>Subscription management (suspend, reactivate, cancel, change payment method, change next cycle date, change subscription amount)</li>
<li>Automatic order creation when subscriptions are renewed</li>
<li>Transaction amount update option for Direct Debit SEPA, Invoice, Prepayment &amp; Barzahlen/viacash</li>
<li>Responsive templates</li>
</ul>
<h4>PCI COMPLIANT RISK MANAGEMENT &amp; FRAUD PREVENTION</h4>
<p>Novalnet provides all its merchants secure payment processing in a PCI DSS Level 1 compliant manner. More than <a href="https://www.novalnet.com/risk-management/" title="60 fraud prevention modules" rel="nofollow ugc">60 fraud prevention modules</a> are integrated to ensure machine learning fraud prevention and optimal risk minimization in real-time.</p>
<h4>AVOID MULTIPLE CONTRACTS &amp; HIDDEN COSTS</h4>
<p>This free WooCommerce Payment Plugin integrates your e-commerce business with Novalnet’s all-in-one payment platform to grow revenue. The integration and services are customizable based on individual customer needs. Novalnet’s prizing depends on your business model and chosen payment methods.</p>
<p>Please contact us for more information:<a href="mailto:&#115;&#097;&#x6c;&#x65;&#x73;&#x40;&#x6e;&#111;&#118;&#097;&#108;&#110;&#x65;&#x74;&#x2e;&#x64;&#x65;&#047;" title="sales@novalnet.de" rel="nofollow ugc">sales@novalnet.de</a> or +49 89 9230683-20.</p>
<h4>ABOUT NOVALNET AG</h4>
<p><a href="https://www.novalnet.de/" title="Novalnet" rel="nofollow ugc">Novalnet</a> is a financial service institution offering payment solutions world-wide. We support customers all the way from setting up payment types and intelligent fraud prevention modules, to legitimate and reliable receivables and claims management. Operating in the market as a full payment service provider since 2007, we enable maximal reliability and client focus to all customers in every area of payment processing. Novalnet AG is a licensed payment institute which is regulated by the Federal Financial Supervisory Authority (BaFin).</p>
<h4>PLUGIN COMPATIBILITY</h4>
<p>To process Novalnet payments through this WooCommerce Payment Plugin, a <a href="https://www.novalnet.de/kontakt/sales/" title="Novalnet account" rel="nofollow ugc">Novalnet account</a> is needed.</p>
<ul>
<li>Compatible with WordPress/WooCommerce plugins</li>
<li>Works with WooCommerce Subscription plugin</li>
<li>Works with WordPress Multi-Site</li>
<li>Supports Sequential Order Numbers Pro Plugin (Custom Order Numbers for WooCommerce)</li>
<li>Supports Debug Log feature  </li>
</ul>
<h4>REFERENCE</h4>
<p>Please check out our ssl certified <a href="https://woocommerce.novalnet.de/" title="Demo Store" rel="nofollow ugc">Demo Store</a></p>
<h3>Arbitrary section</h3>
<h4>Connect to WooCommerce:</h4>
<ol>
<li>
<p>Switch back to the WordPress admin area.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Click on &#8220;WooCommerce&#8221; in the menu on the left and click directly on the sublevel tab &#8220;Settings&#8221; tab there.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Inside the &#8220;Novalnet Global Configuration&#8221; tab you will have the Novalnet merchant global configuration. It will follow the below mentioned structure</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><strong>Product activation key</strong> Kindly enter the exact key from Novalnet admin area</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Payment access key</strong> Kindly enter the exact key from Novalnet admin area</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Select Tariff ID</strong> Kindly select the tariff from the list</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Subscription Tariff ID</strong> Kindly select the subscription tariff from the list</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Display payment method logo</strong> Option to display the payment logo for all payments. Logo will be displayed at the checkout</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Subscription Management</strong> Subscription settings</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Notification / Webhook URL</strong> Notification / Webhook URL settings</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Please click on the “Checkout” tab in order to configure your Novalnet payment interface properly. Inside the “Checkout” tab you will have the individual payment (eg. Direct Debit SEPA) configuration. The payment configuration is structured as follows:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><strong>Enable payment method</strong> Option to enable respective payment. Payment will be displayed at the checkout</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Enable test mode</strong> Option for the respective payment mode to be in live or test mode</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Payment name &amp; description language</strong> Kindly mention the name for the respective payment type</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Title</strong> The freely configurable description entered here is displayed when your customers select the respective payment type</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Description</strong> The freely configurable description entered here is displayed when your customers select the respective payment type</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>One-click shopping</strong> One click shopping for Direct Debit SEPA, Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee, Instalment by Direct Debit SEPA, Credit/Debit Cards and PayPal.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<p>Now, just the following steps have to be executed for going live:</p>
<h4>TRANSLATIONS</h4>
<ul>
<li>English</li>
<li>German</li>
</ul>
<h4>GO-LIVE:</h4>
<p>Now execute the following steps to go live and start your sales:</p>
<ul>
<li>Install the WooCommerce Payment Plugin by Novalnet directly from the WordPress repository </li>
<li>Find the detailed information in the Installation Guide (incl. in the package) </li>
<li>Configure Product Activation Key in the shop admin panel</li>
<li>Activate &amp; configure the preferred payment types in your shop admin panel </li>
<li>You are ready to go!</li>
</ul>
<p>Please contact <a href="mailto:&#115;&#097;&#x6c;&#x65;&#x73;&#x40;&#x6e;&#111;&#118;&#097;&#108;&#110;&#x65;&#x74;&#x2e;&#x64;&#x65;&#047;" title="sales@novalnet.de" rel="nofollow ugc">sales@novalnet.de</a> / 0049-89-923 068 320 for any technical issues or questions.</p>
<h4>DISTRIBUTION</h4>
<p>This plugin enables the integration between WooCommerce and Novalnet payments. The plugin is free and released under the GNU General Public License. If you have found this script useful, please let also others know about it! Recommendations as well as comments in the merchant forum will be appreciated!</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:2438:"<h4>Compatibility</h4>
<p>Novalnet payment plugin compatible for WooCommerce 3.0.0-5.9.0 and compatible for subscription 2.0.0-3.1.6.</p>
<h4>Automatic Installation:</h4>
<ul>
<li>Go to Plugins &gt; “Add New”.</li>
<li>Download the WooCommerce payment plugin &#8211; Novalnet from WordPress repository and Click &#8220;Install Now&#8221; to install the plugin. A popup window will ask you to confirm your wish to install the plugin 4.0.0.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Note:</h4>
<p>If this is the first time you&#8217;ve installed a WordPress plugin, you may need to enter the FTP login credential information. If you&#8217;ve installed the plugin before, it will still have the login information. This information is available through your web server host.</p>
<ul>
<li>Click “Proceed” to continue the installation. The resulting installation screen will list the installation as successful or note any problems during the install.</li>
<li>If successful, click &#8220;Activate Plugin&#8221; to activate it, or “Return to Plugin Installer” for further actions.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Manual Installation:</h4>
<ul>
<li>Download WooCommerce payment plugin &#8211; Novalnet to your desktop. (If downloaded as a zip archive, extract the plugin folder to your desktop.)</li>
<li>Copy the plugin folder and paste into root/wp-content/plugins/ directory.</li>
<li>Go to Plugins (Novalnet payment plugin &#8211; WooCommerce) screen and find the “Novalnet payment plugin &#8211; WooCommerce” in the list.</li>
<li>Click “Activate Plugin” to activate it.</li>
<li>Check the details in the readme file for customization and further instructions.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Now you can get your Product activation key from the Novalnet Admin Portal:</h4>
<p>For this, kindly login into the Novalnet Admin Portal:</p>
<ol>
<li>Go to http://www.novalnet.com and click on &#8220;Login&#8221; (top right). You will be redirected to Novalnet Admin Portal login form.</li>
<li>Inside the Novalnet Admin Portal, choose the tab &#8220;Project&#8221; and click on the respective project in the list.</li>
<li>Click on the tab &#8220;Shop Parameters&#8221;.</li>
<li>You can find the Product activation key, Payment access key and enter the keys in Novalnet global configuration. Click on the &#8220;Save changes&#8221; button to configure and save the merchant details.</li>
</ol>
<h4>Now you have all required details to finish setting up your WooCommerce webshop!</h4>
";s:3:"faq";s:3042:"
<dt id='do%20i%20require%20an%20novalnet%20merchant%20account%20before%20i%20can%20use%20the%20woocommerce%20novalnet%20payment%20plugin%3F'>
Do I require an Novalnet merchant account before I can use the WooCommerce Novalnet payment plugin?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes, in order to use this plugin and access all popular online payment methods within your WooCommerce webshop you must require valid and approved Novalnet account. please contact our sales team <strong>sales@novalnet.de / 0049-89-923 068 320</strong></p>
</p>
<dt id='where%20merchant%20can%20find%20product%20activation%20key%3F'>
Where merchant can find product activation key?
</h4>
<p>
<p>To get the Product Activation Key, please go to <a href="https://admin.novalnet.de/" title="Novalnet admin portal" rel="nofollow ugc">Novalnet admin portal</a> &#8211; PROJECTS: Project Information &#8211; Shop Parameters: API Signature (Product activation key).</p>
</p>
<dt id='how%20to%20configure%20server%20ip%2C%20vendor%20script%20url%20%26%20paypal%20api%3F'>
How to configure server IP, vendor script URL &amp; Paypal API?
</h4>
<p>
<p><strong>IP Address Configuration</strong></p>
<p>For all API access (Auto configuration with Product Activation Key, loading Credit Card iframe, Transaction API access, Transaction status enquiry, and update), it is required to configure a server IP address in Novalnet administration portal.</p>
<p>To configure an IP address, please go to <a href="https://admin.novalnet.de/" title="Novalnet admin portal" rel="nofollow ugc">Novalnet admin portal</a> &#8211; PROJECTS: Project Information &#8211; Project Overview: Payment Request IP&#8217;s &#8211; Update Payment Request IP.</p>
<p><strong>Vendor Script URL Configuration</strong></p>
<p>Vendor script URL is required to keep the merchant’s database/system up-to-date and synchronized with Novalnet transaction status. It is mandatory to configure the Vendor Script URL in Novalnet administration portal.</p>
<p>Novalnet system (via asynchronous) will transmit the information on each transaction and its status to the merchant’s system.</p>
<p>To configure Vendor Script URL, please go to <a href="https://admin.novalnet.de/" title="Novalnet admin portal" rel="nofollow ugc">Novalnet admin portal</a> &#8211; PROJECTS: Project Information &#8211; Project Overview &#8211; Vendor script URL.</p>
<p><strong>Paypal API Configuration</strong></p>
<p>To configure Paypal API details, please go to <a href="https://admin.novalnet.de/" title="Novalnet admin portal" rel="nofollow ugc">Novalnet admin portal</a> &#8211; PROJECTS: Project Information &#8211; Payment Methods: Paypal &#8211; Configure.</p>
</p>
<dt id='does%20this%20plugin%20work%20with%20other%20webshop%20plugins%3F'>
Does this plugin work with other Webshop Plugins?
</h4>
<p>
<p>This online payment plugin only works with the WooCommerce webshop. Are you looking for other online payment modules for webshop software? Please Find the complete overview of our webshop modules on our website. https://www.novalnet.de</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:13043:"<h4>12.0.10</h4>
<ul>
<li>[Fix] Adjusted the payment plugin for multistep checkout page to support Germanized pro plugin</li>
<li>[Fix] Adjusted the instalment cycle amount in order confirmation e-mail for end-customers</li>
</ul>
<h4>12.0.9</h4>
<ul>
<li>[Fix] Default Hold stock duration is extended for pending orders to avoid order cancellation</li>
<li>[Fix] Order amount rounded to 2 decimal factors while sending to the Novalnet server</li>
</ul>
<h4>12.0.8</h4>
<ul>
<li>[Fix] Payment redirection is optimized for successful transactions when previous transactions failed for the same order</li>
</ul>
<h4>12.0.7</h4>
<ul>
<li>[Fix] Optimized payment enabling in the payment method page</li>
<li>[Enhanced] Credit/Debit Cards payment method description</li>
<li>[Enhanced] Optimized the payment plugin for Virtual and Downloadable products</li>
<li>[Enhanced] For every recurring subscription orders the parent order number is used as reference transactions</li>
</ul>
<h4>12.0.6</h4>
<ul>
<li>[New] Subscription reactivation handled, when Subscription order is &#8216;Cancelled&#8217;</li>
<li>[Fix] Error logs from Przelewy24 payment</li>

<li>[Fix] Refund process for PayPal payment</li>
<li>[Fix] Exact order numbers are fetched and updated for the subscription renewal orders</li>

</ul>

<h4>11.1.0</h4>
<ul>
<li>Novalnet Merchant API configuration has been globally implemented.</li>
<li>On-hold transaction configuration (For Credit Card, Direct Debit SEPA, Invoice and PayPal).</li>
<li>Merchant script notification mail configuration.</li>
<li>Merchant can set up their Referrer ID.</li>
<li>Auto-fill for payment data (Direct Debit SEPA).</li>
<li>Fraud prevention through PIN by Callback/SMS. (For Direct Debit SEPA and Invoice).</li>
<li>Subscription management.</li>
<li>Order and transaction management.</li>
<li>VOID &amp; CAPTURE option for on-hold transaction payments (Direct Debit SEPA, Credit Card, Invoice, Prepayment and PayPal).</li>
<li>Refund option for Credit Card, Direct Debit SEPA, Invoice, Prepayment, Instant Bank Transfer, iDEAL, PayPal, eps, giropay  and Przelewy24.</li>
<li>Transaction amount update option (For Direct Debit SEPA, Invoice and Prepayment).</li>
<li>Due date change option for Prepayment and Invoice payment.</li>
<li>Affiliate management system.</li>
<li>Auto configuration of vendor credentials.</li>
<li>Zero amount booking for Direct Debit SEPA, Credit Card and PayPal.</li>
<li>One click shopping for Direct Debit SEPA, Credit Card and PayPal.</li>
<li>Credit Card iframe updated.</li>
<li>Customized CSS settings for Credit Card iframe form.</li>
<li>Implemented Direct Debit SEPA with payment guarantee, Invoice with payment guarantee, giropay and Przelewy24 payments.</li>
<li>Edit option in Direct Debit SEPA, Credit Card and PayPal for registered customers.</li>
<li>Direct Debit SEPA overlay removed.</li>
<li>Notify URL configuration in shop backend.</li>
<li>Logo control has been implemented in global configuration.</li>
<li>Responsive templates has been implemented.</li>
<li>New booking with payment reference.</li>
</ul>

lnet-gateway.12.0.4.zip";s:6:"12.0.5";s:78:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/woocommerce-novalnet-gateway.12.0.5.zip";s:6:"12.0.6";s:78:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/woocommerce-novalnet-gateway.12.0.6.zip";s:6:"12.0.7";s:78:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/woocommerce-novalnet-gateway.12.0.7.zip";s:6:"12.0.8";s:78:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/woocommerce-novalnet-gateway.12.0.8.zip";s:6:"12.0.9";s:78:"https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/woocommerce-novalnet-gateway.12.0.9.zip";}s:11:"donate_link";s:23:"https://www.novalnet.de";s:5:"icons";a:2:{s:2:"1x";s:81:"https://ps.w.org/woocommerce-novalnet-gateway/assets/icon-128x128.png?rev=1636784";s:2:"2x";s:81:"https://ps.w.org/woocommerce-novalnet-gateway/assets/icon-256x256.png?rev=1636784";}s:12:"contributors";a:0:{}s:6:"market";N;s:11:"custom_link";N;}s:15:"google-site-kit";a:28:{s:4:"name";s:68:"Site Kit by Google &#8211; Analytics, Search Console, AdSense, Speed";s:4:"slug";s:15:"google-site-kit";s:7:"version";s:6:"1.48.1";s:6:"author";s:50:"<a href="https://opensource.google.com">Google</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:38:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/google/";s:8:"requires";s:3:"4.7";s:6:"tested";s:5:"5.8.2";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.6";s:6:"rating";i:82;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:315;i:4;i:19;i:3;i:18;i:2;i:22;i:1;i:65;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:439;s:15:"support_threads";i:158;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:136;s:10:"downloaded";i:27964412;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2021-12-21 8:12pm GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2019-10-31";s:8:"homepage";s:30:"https://sitekit.withgoogle.com";s:8:"sections";a:4:{s:11:"description";s:1998:"<p>Site Kit is the official WordPress plugin from Google for insights about how people find and use your site. Site Kit is the one-stop solution to deploy, manage, and get insights from critical Google tools to make the site successful on the web. It provides authoritative, up-to-date insights from multiple Google products directly on the WordPress dashboard for easy access, all for free.</p>
<h4>Bringing the best of Google tools to WordPress</h4>
<p>Site Kit includes powerful features that make using these Google products seamless and flexible:</p>
<ul>
<li>Easy-to-understand stats directly on your WordPress dashboard</li>
<li>Official stats from multiple Google tools, all in one dashboard</li>
<li>Quick setup for multiple Google tools without having to edit the source code of your site</li>
<li>Metrics for your entire site and for individual posts</li>
<li>Easy-to-manage, granular permissions across WordPress and different Google products</li>
</ul>
<h4>Supported Google tools</h4>
<p>Site Kit shows key metrics and insights from different Google products:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Search Console:</strong> Understand how Google Search discovers and displays your pages in Google Search. Track how many people saw your site in Search results, and what query they used to search for your site.</li>
<li><strong>Analytics:</strong> Explore how users navigate your site and track goals you&#8217;ve set up for your users to complete.</li>
<li><strong>AdSense:</strong> Keep track of how much your site is earning you.</li>
<li><strong>PageSpeed Insights:</strong> See how your pages perform compared to other real-world sites. Improve performance with actionable tips from PageSpeed Insights.</li>
<li><strong>Tag Manager:</strong> Use Site Kit to easily set up Tag Manager- no code editing required. Then, manage your tags in Tag Manager.</li>
<li><strong>Optimize:</strong> Use Site Kit to easily set up Optimize- no code editing required. Then, set up A/B tests in Optimize.</li>
</ul>
";s:12:"installation";s:1803:"<p><strong>Note</strong>: Make sure that your website is live. If your website isn&#8217;t live yet, Site Kit can&#8217;t show you any data.<br />
However, if you have a staging environment in addition to your production site, Site Kit can display data from your production site in the staging environment. Learn how to use <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/using-site-kit-on-a-staging-environment/" rel="nofollow ugc">Site Kit with a staging environment</a>.</p>
<h4>Installation from within WordPress</h4>
<ol>
<li>Visit <strong>Plugins &gt; Add New</strong>.</li>
<li>Search for <strong>Site Kit by Google</strong>.</li>
<li>Install and activate the Site Kit by Google plugin.</li>
<li>Connect Site Kit to your Google account. If there are multiple WordPress admins, keep in mind that each admin must connect their own Google account in order to access the plugin.</li>
</ol>
<h4>Manual installation</h4>
<ol>
<li>Upload the entire <code>google-site-kit</code> folder to the <code>/wp-content/plugins/</code> directory.</li>
<li>Visit <strong>Plugins</strong>.</li>
<li>Activate the Site Kit by Google plugin.</li>
<li>Connect Site Kit to your Google account. If there are multiple WordPress admins, keep in mind that each admin must connect their own Google account in order to access the plugin.</li>
</ol>
<h4>After activation</h4>
<ol>
<li>Visit the new <strong>Site Kit</strong> menu.</li>
<li>Follow the instructions in the setup flow.</li>
<li>Go to the main Site Kit dashboard which already displays key metrics from Search Console.</li>
<li>Connect additional Google tools under <strong>Site Kit &gt; Settings</strong>. Learn more about <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/choose-tools/" rel="nofollow ugc">which tools are right for you</a>.</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:4384:"<p>For more information, visit the <a href="https://sitekit.withgoogle.com/documentation/" rel="nofollow ugc">official Site Kit website</a>.</p>

<dt id='is%20site%20kit%20free%3F'>
Is Site Kit free?
</h4>
<p>
<p>The Site Kit plugin is free and open source, and will remain so. Individual Google products included in Site Kit are subject to standard terms and fees (if any) for those products.</p>
</p>
<dt id='what%20are%20the%20minimum%20requirements%20for%20site%20kit%3F'>
What are the minimum requirements for Site Kit?
</h4>
<p>
<p>In order to successfully install and use Site Kit, your site must meet the following requirements:</p>
<ul>
<li>WordPress version 4.7+</li>
<li>PHP version 5.6+</li>
<li>Modern browser – Internet Explorer is not supported</li>
<li>Is publicly accessible – it isn’t in maintenance mode, accessible only via password, or otherwise blocked</li>
<li>REST API is available – Site Kit must be able to communicate via REST API with Google services. To ensure that the REST API is available for your site, go to Tools &gt; Site Health.</li>
</ul>
</p>
<dt id='why%20is%20my%20dashboard%20showing%20%E2%80%9Cgathering%20data%E2%80%9D%20and%20none%20of%20my%20service%20data%3F'>
Why is my dashboard showing “gathering data” and none of my service data?
</h4>
<p>
<p>It can take a few days after connecting Site Kit to a Google service for data to begin to display in your dashboard. The “gathering data” message typically appears when you’ve recently set up a Google service (i.e. just created a new Analytics account) and/or your site is new, and data is not yet available for display.</p>
<p>If you are still seeing this message after a few days, feel free to get in touch with us on the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/google-site-kit/">support forum</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='why%20aren%E2%80%99t%20any%20ads%20appearing%20on%20my%20site%20after%20i%20connected%20adsense%3F'>
Why aren’t any ads appearing on my site after I connected AdSense?
</h4>
<p>
<p>If you’re new to AdSense when you connect via Site Kit, your new AdSense account and your site will need to be manually reviewed and approved for ads by the AdSense team. Ads will not display until your account and site have been approved. <a href="https://support.google.com/adsense/answer/76228" rel="nofollow ugc">Check out this guide for more information about the approval process and timeline.</a></p>
<p>You can check your approval status in Site Kit by going to Settings &gt; Connected Services &gt; AdSense and clicking “Check your site status.” This link will direct you to AdSense. If you see “Ready,” your account and site have been approved and should be displaying ads. If you see “Getting ready…,” your account and site are still under review and your site will not display ads until they have been approved.</p>
<p>If the AdSense snippet is successfully embedded on your site <strong>and</strong> your account and site have been approved, but your site is still not showing ads, <a href="https://support.google.com/adsense/#topic=3373519" rel="nofollow ugc">contact the AdSense Help Center for assistance</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='is%20site%20kit%20gdpr%20compliant%3F'>
Is Site Kit GDPR compliant?
</h4>
<p>
<p>When using Site Kit, site owners are responsible for managing notice and consent requirements – including GDPR requirements – as described in <a href="https://policies.google.com/terms" rel="nofollow ugc">Google’s Terms of Service</a>.</p>
<p>By default, Site Kit does anonymize IP addresses upon activation of the Google Analytics module. In addition, Site Kit provides a mechanism in the form of a simple API for cookie consent plugins to integrate with Site Kit and prevent Site Kit&#8217;s Google service snippets from being rendered on a page if the user has not granted consent. More information about how this API works is available in <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2087" rel="nofollow ugc">this GitHub issue</a>.</p>
</p>
<dt id='where%20can%20i%20get%20additional%20support%3F'>
Where can I get additional support?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Please create a new topic on our <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/google-site-kit/">WordPress.org support forum</a>. Be sure to follow the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/guidelines/">support forum guidelines</a> when posting.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:195055:"<h4>1.48.1</h4>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Revert fix to prevent minification of already minified JS files by other plugins as it caused JS translations to no longer be delivered by wordpress.org. Props kebbet. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4592" rel="nofollow ugc">#4592</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.48.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add title to the overall page metrics widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4454" rel="nofollow ugc">#4454</a>.</li>
<li>Add icons to Unified Dashboard navigation. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4438" rel="nofollow ugc">#4438</a>.</li>
<li>Update production assets to include a <code>.min</code> suffix in the filename. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4436" rel="nofollow ugc">#4436</a>.</li>
<li>Update the URL search component to display the current entity title by default. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4426" rel="nofollow ugc">#4426</a>.</li>
<li>Update the plugin activation banner to be a simple CTA link instead of replicating the splash screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4403" rel="nofollow ugc">#4403</a>.</li>
<li>Update the behaviour of the PageSpeed&#8217;s <code>visit the dashboard</code> link to scroll to the PSI widget when the user lands on the dashboard page. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4380" rel="nofollow ugc">#4380</a>.</li>
<li>Include query parameter for custom Analytics step in the service setup flow URLs. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4342" rel="nofollow ugc">#4342</a>.</li>
<li>Fix issue when AdSense module in the Connect More Services list briefly flashed grey. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4257" rel="nofollow ugc">#4257</a>.</li>
<li>Fix the incorrect difference for chart values when the current and the previous values equal zero. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4255" rel="nofollow ugc">#4255</a>.</li>
<li>Add information about old and new site URLs to the splash screen when URL mismatch is detected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4247" rel="nofollow ugc">#4247</a>.</li>
<li>Add dismissible AdSense CTA widget for monetization section in the unified dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4145" rel="nofollow ugc">#4145</a>.</li>
<li>Update the IdeaHub widget to not display &#8220;Draft created&#8221; message on the draft tab. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3902" rel="nofollow ugc">#3902</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix browser console errors related to Idea Hub on the Appearance &gt; Widgets page in the WordPress Admin. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4466" rel="nofollow ugc">#4466</a>.</li>
<li>Fix visual gap on AdSense dashboard added by adblocker warning widget when no adblocker is detected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4407" rel="nofollow ugc">#4407</a>.</li>
<li>Update the URL search to abort the current search request when the user changes the query. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4402" rel="nofollow ugc">#4402</a>.</li>
<li>Update the PageSpeed Insights links to go to the <code>pagespeed.web.dev</code> domain. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4381" rel="nofollow ugc">#4381</a>.</li>
<li>Fix the incorrect CSS class issue in the widget area renderer component. Props shayannosrat. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4329" rel="nofollow ugc">#4329</a>.</li>
<li>Update the &#8220;Learn More&#8221; links of Analytics and AdSense CTAs to open in a new window. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4286" rel="nofollow ugc">#4286</a>.</li>
<li>Fix missing unit characters issue on zero data widgets. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4238" rel="nofollow ugc">#4238</a>.</li>
<li>Add full stops to the insufficient permissions error description. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4160" rel="nofollow ugc">#4160</a>.</li>
<li>Fix styles for errors on Optimize setup and settings forms. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4028" rel="nofollow ugc">#4028</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where error for an Analytics property in Tag Manager without access would not show up. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3948" rel="nofollow ugc">#3948</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.47.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add a new <code>useInViewSelect</code> hook that allows to call a specific selector only when in view. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4096" rel="nofollow ugc">#4096</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Remove chevron from date range select dropdown button in the header. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4377" rel="nofollow ugc">#4377</a>.</li>
<li>Show Idea Hub surveys after fewer Idea Hub interactions. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4368" rel="nofollow ugc">#4368</a>.</li>
<li>Update Unified Dashboard navigation chips to scroll to an area instead of relying on anchor targets. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4367" rel="nofollow ugc">#4367</a>.</li>
<li>Implement splash UI for activating Analytics as part of the initial setup flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4341" rel="nofollow ugc">#4341</a>.</li>
<li>Add title and subtitle to Widget Contexts for Unified Dashboard pages. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4340" rel="nofollow ugc">#4340</a>.</li>
<li>Update dashboard navigation to hide navigation chips for empty areas. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4289" rel="nofollow ugc">#4289</a>.</li>
<li>Add an error message for unknown pages to the Unified Dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4287" rel="nofollow ugc">#4287</a>.</li>
<li>Add a link to the Idea Hub CTA to jump to the Idea Hub widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4275" rel="nofollow ugc">#4275</a>.</li>
<li>Add entity header content area to the Unified Dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4146" rel="nofollow ugc">#4146</a>.</li>
<li>Update dashboard layout to hide sections that have no widgets. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4136" rel="nofollow ugc">#4136</a>.</li>
<li>Revise wording when no entity can be determined based on the given URL in the entity dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4097" rel="nofollow ugc">#4097</a>.</li>
<li>Implement Unified Dashboard tab bar with chip/pill links to widget areas. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4053" rel="nofollow ugc">#4053</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Changed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Remove HTML tags from report errors. Props oscarssanchez. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4169" rel="nofollow ugc">#4169</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update the frontend AdSense code to load asynchronously. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4398" rel="nofollow ugc">#4398</a>.</li>
<li>Fix missing monetization widgets on the Unified Dashboard issue. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4348" rel="nofollow ugc">#4348</a>.</li>
<li>Add unit characters to the Overall Page Metrics widget in the Unified Dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4312" rel="nofollow ugc">#4312</a>.</li>
<li>Fix missing Unique Visitors From Search sparkline issue for zero data state. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4237" rel="nofollow ugc">#4237</a>.</li>
<li>Update Tag Manager to pre-select account and containers only when the user has just one account. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4209" rel="nofollow ugc">#4209</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.46.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update WordPress dashboard widget and admin bar stats to display zero states for Search Console/Analytics only when the respective service is gathering data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4270" rel="nofollow ugc">#4270</a>.</li>
<li>Update the Idea Hub widget to clear errors when switching tabs. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4207" rel="nofollow ugc">#4207</a>.</li>
<li>Hide individual module pages when the <code>unifiedDashboard</code> flag is enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4134" rel="nofollow ugc">#4134</a>.</li>
<li>Update PageSpeed Insights to be active by default for new installs and remove CTAs. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4133" rel="nofollow ugc">#4133</a>.</li>
<li>Improve loading state for GA4 Analytics dropdown in settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4106" rel="nofollow ugc">#4106</a>.</li>
<li>Add a generic content area for the Header in the Unified Dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4050" rel="nofollow ugc">#4050</a>.</li>
<li>Add Entity search to Unified Dashboard Header. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4049" rel="nofollow ugc">#4049</a>.</li>
<li>Add the Optimize snippet notice to settings and setup forms. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3822" rel="nofollow ugc">#3822</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce a new filter that allows for persistent data to be deleted during reset. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3201" rel="nofollow ugc">#3201</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Changed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Implement the new <code>useInView</code> hook. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4120" rel="nofollow ugc">#4120</a>.</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>Fix issue with the Idea Hub notification banner that was blocked by the setup success banner. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/4274" rel="nofollow ugc">#4274</a>.</li>

<li>Fix Idea Hub CTA for saved ideas on the WordPress dashboard to only show if the user has any saved ideas. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3845" rel="nofollow ugc">#3845</a>.</li>
<li>Update Sidekick zero state graphics with proper files. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3840" rel="nofollow ugc">#3840</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Idea Hub dashboard widget pagination controls from stacking in small viewports. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3838" rel="nofollow ugc">#3838</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Idea Hub Tour Activation bug. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3836" rel="nofollow ugc">#3836</a>.</li>
<li>Update Idea Hub new, saved, and draft ideas requests to invalidate the cache when a post created for an idea changes its status. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3757" rel="nofollow ugc">#3757</a>.</li>
<li>Fix a bug where Site Kit did not disable Tag Manager tag when an existing tag was detected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3338" rel="nofollow ugc">#3338</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.39.0</h4>

<h4>1.34.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add Idea Hub notice to the WP dashboard widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3358" rel="nofollow ugc">#3358</a>.</li>
<li>Add initial actions and selectors to <code>core/user</code> data store for handling user surveys. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3355" rel="nofollow ugc">#3355</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance default Analytics property selection when selecting an Analytics account. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3291" rel="nofollow ugc">#3291</a>.</li>
<li>Update success notification for the Analytics module when GA4 support is activated. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3290" rel="nofollow ugc">#3290</a>.</li>
<li>Update Analytics setup to pre-select the GA4 property based on current site URL. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3286" rel="nofollow ugc">#3286</a>.</li>
<li>Implement idea list tabs and basic interaction in Idea Hub widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3276" rel="nofollow ugc">#3276</a>.</li>
<li>Add Idea Hub context for draft posts generated by Idea Hub. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3271" rel="nofollow ugc">#3271</a>.</li>
<li>Add selectors to get draft and published posts created using Idea Hub ideas. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3270" rel="nofollow ugc">#3270</a>.</li>
<li>Add Idea Hub draft post support. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3269" rel="nofollow ugc">#3269</a>.</li>
<li>Add Analytics property select component for showing all UA and GA4 properties. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3246" rel="nofollow ugc">#3246</a>.</li>
<li>Only show Google Analytics property and profile selection if the parent (account/property) is valid. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3243" rel="nofollow ugc">#3243</a>.</li>
<li>Add upper boundary for how long manual user input responses can be. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3229" rel="nofollow ugc">#3229</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance widgets to combine into one widget if all widgets in an area have the same special state. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3225" rel="nofollow ugc">#3225</a>.</li>
<li>Update the wording used for the anonymous usage tracking checkbox label. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1238" rel="nofollow ugc">#1238</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix regression where widget-based single URL screen would show up completely empty for content not found in the WordPress site. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3493" rel="nofollow ugc">#3493</a>.</li>
<li>Fix potential <code>dateRangeLength must be a positive integer.</code> error for Search Console reports with missing dates. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3418" rel="nofollow ugc">#3418</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.33.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Update <code>amp-analytics</code> tag to include configuration for an ads conversion ID when provided. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3282" rel="nofollow ugc">#3282</a>.</li>

<li>Update Analytics setup form UI to support different variants of setup flows. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3247" rel="nofollow ugc">#3247</a>.</li>
<li>Update Analytics data store settings <code>submitChanges</code> infrastructure to include GA4 when enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3245" rel="nofollow ugc">#3245</a>.</li>
<li>Add change validation logic to Google Analytics 4 data store. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3244" rel="nofollow ugc">#3244</a>.</li>
<li>Add selectors to check which Google Analytics UI should be active. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3170" rel="nofollow ugc">#3170</a>.</li>

<li>Introduce PHP classes for modeling post metadata in Site Kit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3154" rel="nofollow ugc">#3154</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate all components to use the new version of the GoogleChart component. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2887" rel="nofollow ugc">#2887</a>.</li>
<li>Clarify explanation of user input responses&#8217; potential effects on other users of the site. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2853" rel="nofollow ugc">#2853</a>.</li>
<li>Add the ability to exclude users who can write posts from being tracked by Google Analytics. Props scottshefler. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/1891" rel="nofollow ugc">#1891</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix potential <code>Cannot read property 'clicks' of undefined</code> JS error that could occur when an uneven number of Search Console report rows was returned. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3348" rel="nofollow ugc">#3348</a>.</li>
<li>Fix a bug where Analytics report data was incomplete for the 90-day date range when also requesting data for the previous period affecting the widget-based module dashboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3232" rel="nofollow ugc">#3232</a>.</li>
<li>Standardize punctuation and formatting of various sentences and phrases throughout the plugin. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2597" rel="nofollow ugc">#2597</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.32.0</h4>

<li>Implement a data store selector for selecting GA4 web data streams for multiple property IDs at once. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3104" rel="nofollow ugc">#3104</a>.</li>

<li>Update the background color of open menu buttons in the Site Kit header. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3069" rel="nofollow ugc">#3069</a>.</li>
<li>Allow programmatic modification of the Site Kit generator meta tag. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/938" rel="nofollow ugc">#938</a>.</li>
<li>Clarify some AdSense labels and format the monetary values in top earning pages tables with the relevant currency. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/656" rel="nofollow ugc">#656</a>.</li>
<li>Update popular pages list tables on the Analytics module dashboard to be consistent with the same components on the main Site Kit and WordPress dashboards. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/98" rel="nofollow ugc">#98</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>

<li>Fix a bug that could cause the first profile to be selected in Analytics Settings when an existing tag was detected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2888" rel="nofollow ugc">#2888</a>.</li>

</ul>
<h4>1.31.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add method to get list of all base capabilities used by Site Kit. Props JoryHogeveen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3130" rel="nofollow ugc">#3130</a>.</li>
<li>Update widget header styles to use grid mechanics instead of static margins. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3119" rel="nofollow ugc">#3119</a>.</li>
<li>Implement the technical infrastructure for rendering GA4 snippets in the frontend, including support for double tagging integrating with a UA snippet. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3106" rel="nofollow ugc">#3106</a>.</li>
<li>Implement REST data point and JS data store selector to look up a single GA4 property by ID. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3102" rel="nofollow ugc">#3102</a>.</li>
<li>Rename &#8220;Popularity&#8221; / &#8220;Top Queries&#8221; section to &#8220;Acquisition&#8221; for new widget-based UI. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3065" rel="nofollow ugc">#3065</a>.</li>
<li>Improve styling for Site Kit header, especially on mobile devices. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3058" rel="nofollow ugc">#3058</a>.</li>
<li>Update remaining external links in widgets on module pages to include correct date range parameters. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3042" rel="nofollow ugc">#3042</a>.</li>
<li>Improve speed and reliability of Analytics property matching. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3012" rel="nofollow ugc">#3012</a>.</li>
<li>Add placeholder to all &#8220;Other&#8221; text input fields in user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2993" rel="nofollow ugc">#2993</a>.</li>
<li>Implement data store selector to detect whether a GA4 property has a web data stream that matches the current site. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2981" rel="nofollow ugc">#2981</a>.</li>
<li>Update the <code>modules/analytics-4</code> store with actions and selectors for creating and querying web data streams. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2980" rel="nofollow ugc">#2980</a>.</li>

<li>Introduce new JS asset for upcoming GA4 integration. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2977" rel="nofollow ugc">#2977</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce JS data store <code>modules/analytics-4</code> as infrastructure for upcoming GA4 integration. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2976" rel="nofollow ugc">#2976</a>.</li>
<li>Allow modifying the active Search Console property in the module&#8217;s settings panel, relevant for example when a site has multiple applicable properties. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2937" rel="nofollow ugc">#2937</a>.</li>
<li>Fix accessibility problem where it wasn&#8217;t possible to delete user input search terms using the keyboard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2900" rel="nofollow ugc">#2900</a>.</li>
<li>Update user input styles to fix visual issues on small devices. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2886" rel="nofollow ugc">#2886</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate AdSense module page &#8220;Top earning pages&#8221; widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2066" rel="nofollow ugc">#2066</a>.</li>
</ul>

<li>Ensure that the user is not sent to the user input flow when granting additional scopes after being already authenticated, even if submitting the user input response is still required. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2874" rel="nofollow ugc">#2874</a>.</li>

<li>Include button to reset Site Kit under &#8220;Available Tools&#8221; in WordPress, as a way to reset the plugin data e.g. when currently not being connected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2384" rel="nofollow ugc">#2384</a>.</li>
<li>Update modules settings to use separate components for active and inactive modules. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2184" rel="nofollow ugc">#2184</a>.</li>
<li>Improve the pre-setup compatibility checks to properly warn if the REST API is disabled instead of failing with an unexpected error. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2101" rel="nofollow ugc">#2101</a>.</li>
<li>Migrate Analytics module page Top Acquisition Channels widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2069" rel="nofollow ugc">#2069</a>.</li>

<li>Migrate Search Console module page overview widget to use Widget API. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2063" rel="nofollow ugc">#2063</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix critical JS error due to a new version of the Google charts library being released, by locking to a specific version. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3132" rel="nofollow ugc">#3132</a>.</li>
<li>Fix regression where modules may be sorted incorrectly on the plugin&#8217;s settings screen. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3093" rel="nofollow ugc">#3093</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug with help visibility icon in header where clicking it wouldn&#8217;t trigger the menu to open in some scenarios, and also address some visual design problems with it. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3026" rel="nofollow ugc">#3026</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Ad Blocker detection issue which occurred on sites with GoDaddy CDN enabled. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3018" rel="nofollow ugc">#3018</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure changing the site URL between HTTP and HTTPS or <code>www.</code> and non-<code>www.</code> does not impact the results displayed in Analytics and AdSense widgets. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/3005" rel="nofollow ugc">#3005</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where Analytics snippet could still be placed when an existing snippet was already present in the frontend. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2909" rel="nofollow ugc">#2909</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure that the AdSense snippet is not included on 404 pages in the frontend. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2784" rel="nofollow ugc">#2784</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.29.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Only show notice about a user input question affecting other users of the site if there is more than one authorized user on the site overall. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2852" rel="nofollow ugc">#2852</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce new contextual help menu in Site Kit header bar and on the authentication service. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2846" rel="nofollow ugc">#2846</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce tooltip tour guiding the user through the new version of the All Traffic widget. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2739" rel="nofollow ugc">#2739</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance <code>PreviewBlock</code> JS component to support breakpoint-specific sizes via props. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2727" rel="nofollow ugc">#2727</a>.</li>
<li>Implement persistent dismissal of feature tours, stored in the database. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2650" rel="nofollow ugc">#2650</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>ReportTable</code> component for displaying reusable data tables. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2249" rel="nofollow ugc">#2249</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix vertical axis labels for Session Duration graph on Search Console module page to not mix minutes and hours. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2967" rel="nofollow ugc">#2967</a>.</li>
<li>Fix problem where OAuth callback login would be triggered before WordPress&#8217;s login redirect mechanism, immediately failing instead of redirecting as expected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2935" rel="nofollow ugc">#2935</a>.</li>
<li>Ensure entering a text is required when choosing the &#8220;Other&#8221; option for a question in the user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2907" rel="nofollow ugc">#2907</a>.</li>
<li>Fix refactored Analytics goals widget behavior to match legacy version. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2858" rel="nofollow ugc">#2858</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where switching between questions in the user input flow did not scroll the question into view. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2848" rel="nofollow ugc">#2848</a>.</li>
<li>Cache user input responses temporarily in browser until it is submitted while the user is going through the flow, to prevent accidentally losing entered data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2844" rel="nofollow ugc">#2844</a>.</li>
<li>Clarify wording in last user input question about search terms. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2843" rel="nofollow ugc">#2843</a>.</li>
<li>Fix some bugs in the behavior when checking or unchecking an &#8220;Other&#8221; option for one of the questions in the user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2828" rel="nofollow ugc">#2828</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.28.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Implement React components for rendering tooltip tours. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2626" rel="nofollow ugc">#2626</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Automatically focus the &#8220;Other&#8221; text input upon selecting the &#8220;Other&#8221; option in a list of radio buttons or checkboxes. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2897" rel="nofollow ugc">#2897</a>.</li>
<li>Update copy to clarify multiple choice behavior in user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2857" rel="nofollow ugc">#2857</a>.</li>
<li>Update links on new version of AdSense dashboard summary widget to deep link to the respective area in the AdSense frontend. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2774" rel="nofollow ugc">#2774</a>.</li>
<li>Include site URL in AdSense report deep links to point to the appropriate report. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2773" rel="nofollow ugc">#2773</a>.</li>
<li>Add support for PHP 8 and ensure its maintenance via CI. Props TorbenLundsgaard. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2724" rel="nofollow ugc">#2724</a>.</li>
<li>The <code>googlesitekit_authorize_user</code> and <code>googlesitekit_reauthorize_user</code> actions are now also fired when not using the authentication service flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2693" rel="nofollow ugc">#2693</a>.</li>
<li>Implement infrastructure for rendering widgets in Site Kit module screens. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2653" rel="nofollow ugc">#2653</a>.</li>
<li>Use reliable and React-friendly approach for detecting whether a widget is inactive and should not be rendered. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2612" rel="nofollow ugc">#2612</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance localization of duration formatting. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2588" rel="nofollow ugc">#2588</a>.</li>
<li>Filter all Analytics API requests to only include results for the current domain. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2554" rel="nofollow ugc">#2554</a>.</li>
<li>Rely exclusively on SVGs for graphics and remove other image support. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2468" rel="nofollow ugc">#2468</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Improve UX around entering search terms in the user input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2842" rel="nofollow ugc">#2842</a>.</li>
<li>Fix various visual glitches in the user input flow summary view and trim free text content entered for any &#8220;Other&#8221; choice. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2837" rel="nofollow ugc">#2837</a>.</li>
<li>Change to preview / next button behaviour in User Input flow. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2829" rel="nofollow ugc">#2829</a>.</li>
<li>Fix AdSense bug where <code>Ad Client not found</code> error would be displayed in certain cases where an account is still pending. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2812" rel="nofollow ugc">#2812</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where AdGuard and uBlock ad blockers were no longer being recognized by Site Kit by implementing a more holistic solution for ad blocker detection relying on the <code>just-detect-adblock</code> library. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2794" rel="nofollow ugc">#2794</a>.</li>
<li>Update link on AdSense module page to point to Analytics which is more accurate due to the source of the data. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2772" rel="nofollow ugc">#2772</a>.</li>
<li>Fix Search Console x-axis labels on 90 day charts. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2747" rel="nofollow ugc">#2747</a>.</li>
<li>Fix text issue with All Traffic pie chart. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2660" rel="nofollow ugc">#2660</a>.</li>
<li>Fix problem where Analytics snippet placement would not be re-instated after disconnecting Tag Manager module when it was previously taking care of the Analytics tag. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2579" rel="nofollow ugc">#2579</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where tracking opt-in was not working for multisite administrators when not being a member of the site. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2103" rel="nofollow ugc">#2103</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.27.0</h4>
<p><strong>Added</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Add support for AdSense auto ads to Web Stories, allowing to choose an AdSense ad unit to use which will then result in an <code>amp-story-auto-ads</code> element being injected. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2602" rel="nofollow ugc">#2602</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Improve wording for the confirmation notification after submitting user input settings. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2790" rel="nofollow ugc">#2790</a>.</li>
<li>Allow resetting persistent Site Kit options via WP-CLI. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2748" rel="nofollow ugc">#2748</a>.</li>
<li>Display All Traffic widget dimension tabs as a dropdown on narrow viewports. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2743" rel="nofollow ugc">#2743</a>.</li>
<li>Include current dates in AdSense deep links so that the service frontend shows the same time period as Site Kit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2689" rel="nofollow ugc">#2689</a>.</li>
<li>Update Google API client library and remove custom configuration to retry failed API requests as it is now covered in the library itself. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2688" rel="nofollow ugc">#2688</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>WidgetReportError</code> component, which should be used by widgets to display an overall error state. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2670" rel="nofollow ugc">#2670</a>.</li>
<li>Implement REST datapoints and JS datastore infrastructure for getting and dismissing tooltip tours. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2648" rel="nofollow ugc">#2648</a>.</li>
<li>Prepare Widget API-based version of the dashboard for launch, rendering the entire page content including header and footer. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2646" rel="nofollow ugc">#2646</a>.</li>
<li>Add ability to remotely control enabled feature flags. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2533" rel="nofollow ugc">#2533</a>.</li>
<li>Introduce <code>core/ui</code> datastore for centrally storing UI state in JS. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2456" rel="nofollow ugc">#2456</a>.</li>
<li>Include current dates in Analytics deep links so that the service frontend shows the same time period as Site Kit. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2287" rel="nofollow ugc">#2287</a>.</li>
<li>Remove legacy version of the WP Dashboard widget and replace it with Site Kit widget-based refactored version. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2240" rel="nofollow ugc">#2240</a>.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Fixed</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Fix bug where the old All Traffic widget was still displaying in the dashboard for a single URL. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2856" rel="nofollow ugc">#2856</a>.</li>
<li>Fix PHP 8 notice for deprecated <code>uasort()</code> usage. Props oguilleux. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2797" rel="nofollow ugc">#2797</a>.</li>
<li>Reset link hidden while compatibility checks are in progress. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2756" rel="nofollow ugc">#2756</a>.</li>
<li>Show All Traffic pie chart tooltips persistently when a slice is selected to allow interaction with the tooltip, which would not be possible when hovering. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2737" rel="nofollow ugc">#2737</a>.</li>
<li>Fix AdSense dashboard summary widget to include data for the current date range in its sparklines rather than only data from the 1st of the current month. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2734" rel="nofollow ugc">#2734</a>.</li>
<li>Fix visual bug where in the AdSense flow the toggle element could be overlapped by a checkmark icon. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2722" rel="nofollow ugc">#2722</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug with Search Console module page graph where overlapping legends would be displayed when selecting more than 2 metrics. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2721" rel="nofollow ugc">#2721</a>.</li>
<li>Fix various bugs around the All Traffic pie chart (e.g. incorrect slices being selected when changing date range, correct behavior of not allowing &#8220;Others&#8221; to be selected) by introducing a new React-based charts component. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2714" rel="nofollow ugc">#2714</a>.</li>
<li>Fix bug where in some occasions an error would be displayed when updating settings with the same values that were already stored before. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2513" rel="nofollow ugc">#2513</a>.</li>
<li>Fix formatting of y-axis values for Bounce Rate and Session Duration on Analytics overview chart. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2095" rel="nofollow ugc">#2095</a>.</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.26.0</h4>
<p><strong>Enhanced</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>Ensure that any &#8220;Others&#8221; slice in the All Traffic widget is not indicated as selectable and cannot be active. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2716" rel="nofollow ugc">#2716</a>.</li>
<li>When viewing a specific segment of users in the All Traffic widget, make the &#8220;All Users&#8221; breadcrumb a link to go back to the overall users view. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2715" rel="nofollow ugc">#2715</a>.</li>
<li>Enhance All Traffic widget pie chart legend by using a custom implementation so that the labels are never cut off and include a visual hover and active state. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2700" rel="nofollow ugc">#2700</a>.</li>
<li>Show more than just two dates on the All Traffic widget&#8217;s line chart. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2699" rel="nofollow ugc">#2699</a>.</li>
<li>Include available and enabled Site Kit features in Site Health information. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2662" rel="nofollow ugc">#2662</a>.</li>
<li>Rename the <code>header</code> and <code>footer</code> props of the <code>Widget</code> component to <code>Header</code> and <code>Footer</code> to indicate that they require a React component instead of an element. See <a href="https://github.com/google/site-kit-wp/issues/2652" rel="nofollow ugc">#2652</a>.</li>
